I am a mimeplayer as a professional, play theatre acts on festivals, busines parties, weddings, conferences, etc. On the picture is shown me and my husband as "Henk en Ien",  our cotton candy act. www.suikerspinmachien.nl.
My initiative to start renting an apartment was inspired by my colleague, who did it already in The Hague, Maff apartment.
now it is, next to my work, my pasion to entertain people and make sure that my guests feel at home.
The apartment is renovated is 2008 with help from an architect, my husband and a few great workers to make it a little palace in Rotterdam. Sometimes, when it is not rented, me and my husband stay there to be on holliday for a night. We always ejoy staying.

name: Condo in Rotterdam · ★4.92 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
host_about:
This apartment is my "pied a terre" in Rotterdam acquired many years ago.  Kralingen, where the apartment is located, was a village until 1895(?) and still feels like a village even though it is only 1 kilometer from the heart of Rotterdam...such as the main public library,  the main fruit and vegetable market and the Hoogstraat (Highstreet or Main St.).

The nearby streets and houses are really lovely, lovely, lovely and very quaint...  Just thinking about taking a walk within a block or two from my apartment lifts my spirits even when I am not at home in Rotterdam.    Rotterdam  is constantly changing and is a great modern city.

It would be my pleasure to give you more info on Rotterdam and the Netherlands ... just let me know what your interests are!

Saturdays I watch my sons football match and I do some groceries on the Rotterdam Market.

name: Boat in Rotterdam · ★4.86 · 1 bedroom · 3 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview: The ship is moored in the small harbour of the former Rotterdam water company, right next to its monumental watertower. De Esch is now a residential area, a mix of modern architecture and the old water company buildings.  At walking distance (2 minutes) there is a shopping centre with a supermarket, cafe Tomtom and restaurant De Watertoren (in the watertower).  Also in the area nearby are Erasmus University, business centre Rivium, Arboretum Trompenburg and a nature walking/jogging path along the New Meuse.
host_about:
I'm an entrepreneur in the leisure field in Rotterdam.
I like meeting people from all parts of the world.
I  enjoy travelling and checking out other B&B's abroad.
I can give my guests a lot of information about Rotterdam and its attractions.
I enjoy rebuilding classic boats in an authentic nautical style.

Dear Guests,

From the first of July 2021 Im the new owner of the ship MS Veinard in Rotterdam. 
Because for my work as fine artist and Polar expedition photographer I'm not always around. Michiel from rhBnB (Rotterdam Host BnB) is the host. If you plan to stay on the MS Veinard he will be your contact person,  receive you and can answer all your questions.

This kind of ship is called a Spits. She is build in Belgium in 1913 and 38.40 meter long and 5.04 meter wide.
From 1948 the ships name is Veinarrd, what ‘Lucky one’ means (bofkont in Dutch).

You are very welcome on the MS VEINARD surrounded by the vibrant city of Rotterdam. 

Esther

name: Hostel in Rotterdam · ★4.79 · 1 bedroom · 8 beds · 3 shared baths
neighborhood_overview: You won’t find us on a busy bar street — at Ani&Haakien you’ll get a good night’s sleep - but no worries, the young and bustling Central District area of Rotterdam with good coffee places, awesome design shops, rooftop bars, jazz and the electronic night life is just a dance away! So, forget about walking around with your heavy bag… drop it at the hostel, and let us tell you all about the cool stuff to do in Rotterdam. Hostel Ani & Haakien is the perfect hub for day trips! Just 10min to Delft / 40min to Amsterdam / 40min to Utrecht and 20min to The Hague!
host_about: We are Joyce & Danielle who run this cute small hostel in the centre of rotterdam already for 10 years :))) Both born and raised in Rotterdam and together with our superteam we love to welcome all travellers who like to get to know this awesome city!

name: Condo in Rotterdam · ★4.63 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1.5 baths

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.32 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
Boat in Rotterdam · ★4.87 · 8 bedrooms · 22 beds · 3 baths
neighborhood_overview:
Het historisch scheepvaartkwartier is een mooi dorp in Rotterdam centrum.
Prachtige uitzichten, veel groen, fijn wandelen en uitgaan.
host_about:
Uw gastheer is familievader en voert als kapitein samen met vrouw en zonen de zeilrederij Vof Europe Sailing.
Ik woon met familie nabij de te verhuren zeilschepen 'Luciana', 'Catherina' en 'Marie Galant' in de Veerhaven op ons woon/vergaderschip de 'Schoneveld'.
Mijn favoriete reisbestemmingen zijn de te bezeilen landen als Noorwegen, Deense eilanden, Oost en Noordzeekusten en Gomera, La Palma en El Hierro.
Ik heb weinig tijd voor boeken, maar lees graag reisverhalen en (maritieme)geschiedenis.
Mijn vrouw en ik gaan graag met het hele gezin naar de bioscoop.
Ik ben graag gastheer en stel het op prijs vooraf met de klant overleg te voeren, kennis te maken en te peilen wat verlangd wordt.
Bij een verblijf op een schip gaat veiligheid voor alles en dus ben ik dag en nacht mobiel bereikbaar.
Mijn levensmotto is dat wat ik in werktijd mag doen mijn hobby is!

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.77 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview:
ACTIVITIES
Rotterdam knows lots of summer festivals and other outings. Especially the smaller festivals are a good occasion to come to Rotterdam and stay at our B & B. In the mini apartment you will find all kinds of brochures, a map of Rotterdam and a calendar with lots of activities. In the park Heemraadsingel, around the corner from Casa La Rosa, the Singelding is located, a cozy place to drink a cup of coffee or to take part to the activities it organizes. In addition, keep yourself up to date with the workshops on healthy cooking that Fabiana organizes through her blog byebyesalsiccia.
host_about: We are a Dutch Italian family with two young kids.

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.88 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview:
Welcome to Rubroek, the hidden gem of Rotterdam that's just waiting for you to explore its delights. Get ready to immerse yourself in my neighbourhood where creativity, vintage charm and urban energy converge into a symphony of awesomeness.
As you stroll through the streets, you'll find artisinal coffee shops that rival the coolest cafes in the world. Grab a cup of meticulously brewed coffee or a unique herbal tea blend, and take a seat at a wooden table that's practically begging for your indie novel or sketchbook.
Vitage affecionados, this neighbourhood has your name written all over it. Explore thrift stores and boutiques that are filled with retro treasures waiting to be discovered.
And when the sun sets, the energy of Rubroek transforms yet again.
Imagine trendy eateries illuminated by fairy lights, bustling with laughter and conversation. Try unique fusion cuisine or savor artsanal pizza.
( list included in house manual).

name: Home in Rotterdam · 3 bedrooms · 4 beds · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview:
Kralingen is a chic gem set in the east of Rotterdam. With an expansive backyard, where the rest of the city is always welcome for a barbecue: the Kralingse Bos.

The east of Rotterdam boasts the city’s biggest park: the Kralingse Bos. This green oasis is a major attraction for everyone seeking to flee the busy urban streets for some fresh air and peace and quiet. Not that it’s always quiet; the Kralingse Bos is often humming with pleasant activity on sunny weekend afternoons. Nature lovers enjoy a stroll through the forest. Sun-worshipers bask on the lake’s small beach. Toddlers splash around in the wading pool or play at the petting zoo. Bigger children will love exploring the climbing park. People rollerblade, jog and cycle to their heart’s content around the lake and go sailing on the lake, while snacks are served at tables on the waterfront terraces.
host_about: Ejal Breeman has founded several ICT firms, all with a focus on innovation, hardware development, telecommunications and integration of existing ICT systems.

neighborhood_overview: Nature and water. You'll see a lot of sports practiced here: running, biking, rowing, horse back riding. The people living here are a mix of young families and older friendly people.
host_about:
Together with my two boys, I live in one of the most beautiful parts of Rotterdam, at the river the Rotte. It always feels like holiday at home, surrounded by nature, and only 15 minutes (by bike!) from the citycentre.

We all love to travel, and meet new people. And next to traveling, photography is my passion and (lucky me!) profession. 
To combine both of these beautiful things in life makes me a real lucky and happy women! 

Before we bought this house we went traveling for 15 months all over the world, so we know that to really get to know a place, you have to meet and stay with the locals.
That is why we think AirBnB is a perfect medium, both as a guest ánd as a host!

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.94 · 2 bedrooms · 4 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview:
The Witte de Withstraat is a very lively street in the city center, with cultural institutions, restaurants, galleries, cool shops, and bars.
The apartment is right in the middle, across from a former school building, which is now a museum/gallery space for modern art (Tent/Witte de With).

The street is on the so-called Art Axis (Kunst-as) between the museums on the Leuvehaven and the Museum Park (Boijmans Van Beuningen, Het Nieuwe Instituut, the Natural History Museum, and the Kunsthal). The park is a short walk from the apartment. Festivals and markets are held here all year round (including the Parade, Open Air Cinema, Swan Market, Museum Night, etc.).

New in town? There's no better place from which to discover Rotterdam than from this apartment. A must see.
host_about: American living in the Netherlands, freelance translator, mommy of 1...

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★5.0 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview:
History
In the past, members of the more wealthy middle class took up residence in our neighboring houses. Later, the monumental buildings were mainly used as offices or institutions. In the last 20 years the neighborhood is pleasently inhibited by an artistic and entrepeneurial crowd.

The former housemaid sleeping and living quarter in the semi basement was turned into a neat and comfortable appartment in 2011.

Bars, resto's and shops are available around the corner.

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.50 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 1 bath
Condo in Rotterdam · 2 bedrooms · 1 bed · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview: The house is located a 5 minute bike ride or tram ride from the city centre. We also live next to the historical Delfshaven. Shops and public transport are all within 2 min walking distance.
host_about:
We love travelling and exploring. Our biggest trip so far is spending 15 months in South East Asia and Australia. Most of it in Australia (Darwin) actually since we worked there as well. 
Recently we spent two months in Colombia and totally fell in love with the country. We're busy learning Spanish and eager to practice. 
Airbnb for us is getting to know other travellers and enjoy each others company. We love to listen to your stories and share ours. Off course we can give you great tips on Rotterdam and the surroundings. 
We're very relaxed but tidy people and like our guests to be as well. Please feel at home at our house and have fun while you're here. Welcome!

One very important thing! We have hosted many many people. We don't like it if you're late. Please confirm ETA in advance and let us know well ahead if your plans change. We usually have plans too.

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.55 · 2 bedrooms · 3 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview:
wow the neighborhood!! it's great!
it's a neighborhood that has a lot of young beginning couples. quiet and green but very homely. there is a park in front of the apartment and also the lively Vroezenpark (hosts very hip festivals like foodtruck or art and culture). 2 streets from the swimming pool. supermarket with fresh orange juice on the corner. second hand shops, best Italian restaurant of rotterdam! the award winning zoo is walking distance.
host_about:
hi there!! my name is richard, 36. i'm a young designer and furniture-maker turned tour-guide and world-traveler. my speciality is south america. 
in my free time i like to climb, hang out with friends, travel, read and build stuff.

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.76 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 private bath
neighborhood_overview:
The neighbourhood was developed in the twenties and thirties of the 20th century. The street is very atmospheric with large trees and broad sidewalks, and most of the time enough parking space. On one end of the street there is a free accessable sports ground. On the other side it runs into the Heemraadssingel, a spacious area with a canal and a childrens playgroutd.
Two blocks away, the lively Middellandstraat has a multicultural atmosphere and wide range of shops, supermarkets, espressobars and lunchrooms.
host_about:
A freelance graphic and online designer, living and working In Rotterdam with Hennie and our son. 
I like the cultural offerings of the city, such as the museums, theater and cinema's.
In our holidays we like to combine culture with nature, and love to hike and bike.

name: Condo in Rotterdam · ★5.0 · Studio · 1 bed · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview: Residential area, full of young families, designers, architects, students.  Walking distance from restaurants, cafés, supermarkets, drugstore, fresh fish, a great place with freshly roasted nuts, art galleries, and, on Thursdays and Saturdays, a local open air market.
host_about: I am a professional classical musician, originally from Los Angeles.  Have lived in The Netherlands since 2002.  Am a relaxed traveller (I travel frequently for my work) and a courteous guest.

name: Condo in Rotterdam · ★4.96 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in a very nice, hip and interesting area of Rotterdam.

- The apartment is on the top floor
- There are two elevators
- You will have a nice view of the skyline of Rotterdam
- You will find "The Markthal", the "Cube Houses", the outside market and the whole city centre literally around the corner or while standing on the balcony / gallery.
host_about:
Mijn naam is Ditha, 35 jaar en geboren en woonachtig in Rotterdam.
Sinds 2015 ben ik trotse eigenares van dit stadsappartement op de perfecte locatie!
Met mijn partner en baby samen ga ik binnenkort verhuizen naar een buitenwijk van Rotterdam omdat dit mooie stadsappartement gewoonweg te klein is om met z'n 3en in te blijven wonen.
Omdat ik in het verleden jarenlang dit appartement heb verhuurd via o.a. Airbnb, wil ik dat nu opnieuw doen voor een tijdje.
Dit keer is mijn gehele appartement beschikbaar via Airbnb, voorheen woonde ik er zelf ook en tegelijkertijd verhuurde ik een kamer voor 2 personen.

Ik woon, werk en studeer(de) in Rotterdam.
Sinds 2015 werk ik als zelfstandig Recruiter, Relatiemanager en Sollicitatiecoach.
Wat ik erg leuk vind aan mijn werk is het dagelijks schakelen met een diversiteit aan mensen en nationaliteiten op verschillende niveaus.

Naast dat er veel tijd gaat naar mijn lieve baby (dreumes alweer), besteed ik graag tijd aan surfen, mijn familie en vrienden, muziek volleybal, hardlopen en nieuwe plekken ontdekken.
Mijn favoriete muziek is Reggae; ik kan geen dag zonder!

Voor mij is deze plek de ideale plek van wonen; midden in het centrum, alles op loop- en fietsafstand. Ik ervaar hier het ultieme stadsgevoel met nog een beetje groen om mij heen!
Mijn appartement bevindt zich op de topetage waardoor je de hele dag kunt genieten van een mooi uitzicht.
Ik hoop dat mijn gasten zich, net als wij, ultiem thuis voelen op deze plek. Hier doen wij in ieder geval ons uiterste best voor!

name: Condo in Rotterdam · ★4.96 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located nearby metro station Maashaven and a few steps away from the old factory Maassilo where every Saturday great parties are organized. There is also a big shopping centre "Zuidplen" in a walking distance and really easy access to the city centre (15 minutes to Rotterdam Central Station) or 10 minutes to Station "Beurs" that is located nearby the Witte DeWith Street or as I like to say the street that never sleeps :-)
host_about:
It's very difficult to describe yourself really. I'm just a next door guy who, together with my boyfriend loves travelling, discovering new places those nearby and those very far away and meeting new, interesting people :-)

My life is filled with music that in a free time I'm also "sort of" creating on my PC :-)

I also like cooking, reading books, watching movies, going to the theatre, playing computer games... etc, etc :-) Pretty weird combo I know, but I have many interests :-)

I think that's pretty much all I can say in a few words but if you have some questions, please feel free to ask.

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.89 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview:
Werkelijk alles wat een stad u te bieden heeft bevindt zich binnen handbereik. Winkels, restaurants, bioscopen, theater, terrasjes, barretjes, musea, voor elk wat wils. Rotterdam Centraal Station is drie minuten lopen en metro, tram en bussen vertrekken direct voor de deur.
Fietsen kunnen aan de onderzijde van het pand gehuurd worden en hier zijn tevens citytours en guides die u de stad kunnen laten zien.
host_about: Liefhebber van het leven in de stad

name: Home in Rotterdam · ★4.74 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1.5 shared baths
neighborhood_overview:
Visit the district of Delfshaven, located close to vibrant Rotterdam centre. In multicultural Delfshaven no one is an outsider. The people are relaxed and friendly.
Our house is situated on a lovely, little, lively square with benches, an organic shop and McDonalds next door. Around the corner left and right you will find drugstores, money exchange, teller machine, restaurants, pubs, hairdressers,internetcafe, nailstudio, fresh fishstore, butcher, a landromat and a large variety of other small stores.
In romantic, 16th century Historical Delfshaven, close to our house, you will find a small beerfactory, art studio's , a large poolcafé and various nice restaurants.
Across the street is a large supermarket (Jumbo, open from 08:00 - 21:00 seven days a week). On Thursday and Saturday there is a large market at a 5 minute walking distance from the apartment, where you can buy a variety of products. Across from the building there is an evening supermarket, open till midnight.
host_about:
In my free time i enjoy beeing with friends, going out and going to festivals. 
In the summer i love to travel with my old-timer camper and visit festivals in Europe.

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.50 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview: The studio is located in the beautiful historical area: Delfshaven. Delfshaven is one of the most pleasant districts in Rotterdam. Here, you can still feel the atmosphere of pre-war Rotterdam. Discover special places like the Pilgrim Fathers’ Chuerch (Pelgrimvaderskerk), city brewery De Pelgrim, and De Delft, a replica of an 18th-century warship.
host_about:
Hi! Nice you have a look at my Airbnb page. Please let me introduce myself, my name is Stefan de Waal a 34 years old man from Rotterdam and lives in the historic part of Delfshaven Rotterdam together with my girlfriend. 

I am a spontaneous & friendly guy who loves sports & music. My favorite sports are footbal, cycling, snowboarding and kitesurfing. I listen to all sorts of music and I enjoy going to concerts and festivals. Next to that I like going to restaurants and bars for beers, cocktails or for some nice food. So if you need some tips during your visit, I would love to help you!

name: Home in Rotterdam · ★5.0 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 shared bath
Home in Rotterdam · ★4.58 · 4 bedrooms · 5 beds · 2.5 baths
neighborhood_overview:
Our house is part of a very special renovation project. Together with our 25 neighbors we got the houses for free from the local government and renovated them to everyones own wishes. There are a lot of creative people in our block; artists, designers and architects. The inner area of the block is a huge communal garden, making the place a green and quit oasis within the busy city.
The house is situated in the nice, vibrant neighborhood of Rotterdam-West. There are lots of shops, restaurants and coffee places in the direct area. It’s a 5-minute walk from the Van Nelle Fabriek (Unesco world heritage), which offers several events and art fairs during the year. For children there are playgrounds, a petting zoo, a park, the Blijdorp zoo and a very nice and unique ‘wild nature playground’ nearby. The stadium of the Sparta football club leis within the neighborhood; you can hear them cheer on Sunday afternoon.
The historic Delfshaven harbor is on a 5-minute walk, featuring centuri
host_about: Gezin. 2 kinderen.

name: Houseboat in Rotterdam · ★4.76 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1 shared bath
neighborhood_overview:
You're right in the city centre. So all Rotterdam's highlights are within a 15 mins walk! Markthall, Erasmusbridge, Witte de Wittstraat, Tent, Meent, Coolsingel, Kunsthal, Lijnbaan, Booijman van Beuningen Museum, and the list goes on and on...

There is a restaurant right next door, a big super market, and other small shops in the neighbourhood.
host_about:
I am an architect, urban planner and self development trainer.

Born on the East African equator at sunrise on the first day of spring, I was raised throughout Africa, Asia and the Caribbean and have travelled to the far reaches of the world exploring different natures, cultures and spiritual teachings. 

Since 1991 I am based in the Netherlands and have taken my students of architecture and city planning to slums and natural disaster areas across the globe researching and implementing sustainable development. 

I also offer self development workshops and sessions, and run holistic retreats in the Caribbean.

My life is devoted to the betterment of the planet and its peoples. I use my mind, body and soul to support the individual and collective consciousness.

neighborhood_overview: We live in the middle of the Middelland-district next to the center of the city. It is a real Rotterdam neighbourhood, urban and not polished up for tourism. The area is pleasantly vibrant with many options for a drink, quick meal or dinner just around the corner, on the Nieuwe Binnenweg street. Supermarkets and other shops are also located here. Our street is quite and calm, giving you a good rest at night!
host_about:
We are Ralf and Rahmat. We were born and raised up abroad (Germany/Indonesia) but have been living in The Netherlands for many years already. We like the idea to have nice people over here and support them with tips and tricks so they can get the best out of their stay.

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.92 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview: The Witte de Withstraat is very well known in Rotterdam. Art, culture, restaurants, bars, clubs, you find all of it here. Walk into the Museumpark, enjoy some nature and visit de Kunsthal, Boijmans van Beuningen or het Instituut. Stroll through the Leuvehaven en view the city from the top of the Euromast. Go out for diner or get some take away to enjoy on the sunny balcony. Never a dull moment around here.
host_about: Hi, I’m Liek and my husband Pim and I own a lovely apartment in Rotterdam. When we are not there, we love to travel, go out for food and good wines and meet new people. Our life goal is to work location independent and travel with a tiny house!

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.97 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview:
Rotterdam’s Central District is the gateway to the city and home to many international companies and multinationals. The area buzzes with a constant stream of people coming and going, which can make you think of New York. A hive of activity. Rotterdam Central railway station is the Central District’s new landmark.

Central railway station, Concert hall De Doelen, Theatre Stadsschouwburg and Cinema Pathé are literally around the corner on a 3 minutes walking distance.

West-Kruiskade is a long shopping street with shops representing every corner of the world, from Chinese to Surinamese shops selling everything under the sun and from Dutch butcher’s to Turkish baker’s shops. Its many multicultural restaurants and snack bars make it the ideal place to find an exotic bite to eat. The West-Kruiskade is often compared similar to the famous Zeedijk in Amsterdam.

The Museumkwartier is a dynamic area where lots of museums, art institutions and galleries are based

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.98 · 4 bedrooms · 4 beds · 3.5 baths
neighborhood_overview:
The house is centrally located in a beautiful, quiet street in the city centre of Rotterdam. It's a ideal location to explore the local neighborhood and to discover downtown Rotterdam and the rest of the city. The Nieuwe Binnenweg, the longest and most vibrant alternative shopping street of Rotterdam, runs parallel (one block north) to our street. The street is a perfect example of Rotterdam’s diversity. It features a surprising mix of original and authentic stores, local bakeries and coffee places, as well as many bar/restaurants with food from all over the world. Just around our corner are two well-stacked supermarkets (one of which organic). Also around the corner you’ll find one of the best and most relaxed coffee bars in town (Urban Espresso Bar West) and grand cafe (Westerpaviljoen), various great restaurants (Italians, Gourmet Burger, French, Surinam) and a jazz club just around the corner.

Within five minutes walking distance you’ll find the excellent Rotterdam museu

host_about:

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.81 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview:
Known as the StadsDrieHoek (City Triangle), you are right in the centre of the city with a view of the Erasmus Bridge.
A colourful and busy neighbourhood, more suited to singles, couples and trios or a couple with 1 child.

name: Barn in Rotterdam · ★4.80 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview:
The old farm is situated in a beautiful piece of nature, between the big cities! There are only about 20 houses and a couple of months ago a new restaurant opened it's doors! It is only a 5 minute walk from the guesthouse!

It is a lovely area for walking and/or cycling! Also the old city centres of Schiedam, Delft and Rotterdam are pretty nearby and can be reached by bike easily!

Also the beach is pretty nearby! You can drive to Hoekv an Holland in 25 minutes or to the boulevard of Scheveningen in 40 minutes! In 2023 Rotterdam realized a new subway line and from now on you can take the subway all the way from Schiedam to the beach of Hoek van Holland! For more information visit the RET website of 9292ov (website or app on your phone)
host_about: A young couple living on a former farm in the outback of Rotterdam! Nature next to city! Together with our 2 little daughters and our family dog Izzi.

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.80 · 2 bedrooms · 4 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview: Its only a few minutes walk from the trainstation, so also very handy when you want to visit Amsterdam which will take you 50 minutes by train. Also a few minutes walk from the Markthal, cubic houses, metro and the Meent and Boogjes where you can find nice bars and restaurants. Because of the parc in front of the garden also a very quiet place. There is a big market every tuesday and saturday next to the parc. And in front and at the backside of the house enough parkingspace.

name: Townhouse in Rotterdam · ★4.51 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 private bath
neighborhood_overview:
Historisch Delfshaven bevindt zich op 15 minuten loopafstand via de langste winkelstraat van heel Nederland.
Historisch Delfshaven is een uniek stukje oud Rotterdam Met prachtige en bijzondere gevelhuizen waan je je even in de tijd terug. En met alle fijne restaurantjes in de buurt, kun je heerlijk ontbijten, lunchen en dineren. Of met je picknickmand aan het water. Of zelfs een bootje huren. De supermarkten en biologisch winkels zijn op geringe loopafstand. Ook ben je dichtbij het Euromastpark en kun je per watertaxi bijv. naar Hotel Newyork.
host_about:
We like to share this house wich others, in this beautiful neighbourhoud , with great vieuw and nice people. 

I'm a yoga teacher ( you can practise with me if you like) or use my yogaroom. I love the sea, i love animals, i love nature & i love to dance. Dimitri is a sporty man with great passion for kitesurf & Tai Chi.

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.78 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview:
Blijdorp is a neighbourhood in northern Rotterdam and is part of the borough Noord. The up-town neighbourhood has around 9500 inhabitants.

The construction was between 1931 and 1940 and this part of town was not affected by the bombing of Rotterdam of May 14. This is why it has been nominated bij the municipality Rotterdam for the status of conservation area.

Blijdorp is closely associated with the Rotterdam Zoo in the same district.
host_about: Young professional, likes sports, traveling and meeting new cultures.

name: Houseboat in Rotterdam · ★4.76 · 2 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview:
You're right in the city centre. So all Rotterdam's highlights are within a 15 mins walk! Markthall, Erasmusbridge, Witte de Wittstraat, Tent, Meent, Coolsingel, Kunsthal, Lijnbaan, Booijman van Beuningen Museum, and the list goes on and on...

There is a restaurant right next door, a big super market, and other small shops in the neighbourhood.
host_about:
I am an architect, urban planner and self development trainer.

Born on the East African equator at sunrise on the first day of spring, I was raised throughout Africa, Asia and the Caribbean and have travelled to the far reaches of the world exploring different natures, cultures and spiritual teachings. 

Since 1991 I am based in the Netherlands and have taken my students of architecture and city planning to slums and natural disaster areas across the globe researching and implementing sustainable development. 

I also offer self development workshops and sessions, and run holistic retreats in the Caribbean.

My life is devoted to the betterment of the planet and its peoples. I use my mind, body and soul to support the individual and collective consciousness.

name: Guest suite in Rotterdam · ★4.83 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview: Shopping street around the corner, town is very close (10 min with metro). Near the Kralingse plas and wood. Metro and tram 100 meters. Quiet. Near EUR. Centre of Kralingen. Historic district. A lot of restaurants are found here.
host_about:
Ik ben docent beeldende vorming en geef workshops en cursussen aan kinderen en volwassenen in eigen atelier. Ik maak zelf schilderijen in gemengde technieken.
Het atelier ligt achter het huis. Ik fiets, zwem en schaats graag, en bezoek vaak theater, film en concerten in Rotterdam e.o. Ik heb 3 dochters, die het huis uit zijn (vandaar de airbnb activiteiten). Sinds 2020 heb ik een geweldig leuke kleinzoon. 
Het huis waarin ik woon is uit 1903,wat enorm leuk is maar ook niet erg onderhoudsvriendelijk ;). En er zijn veel op en afstapjes. 
Verder heb ik sinds 2017 de ziekte van Parkinson maar daar ben ik nog niet erg door beperkt gelukkig. Veel bewegen (sport) helpt! Daarom af en toe tremor.

name: Serviced apartment in Rotterdam · ★4.75 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview:
Witte de Withstraat is the place to be when visiting Rotterdam. It has many restaurants that are open till late and amazing bars with seating outside. It is a two minute walk to the nearest tube station and three minute walk to the shopping district.

Furthermore it is nearby the Coolsingel which houses the Rotterdam City hall, and it's nearby the shopping boulevard of the city. If you don't like the big shops you can also visite the small boutiques on the Van Oldenbarneveldstraat, Karel Doormanstraat or de Meent.
If you have a panache for art, local products or like to buy things from local artists, entrepreneurs, hobbyist/amateurs, the Witte de Withstraat is dotted with (vintage and pop-up) shops/boutiques & galleries that sell these.

It's a 10 minute walk from:
- the newly constructed Markthal, which you really should visite to buy some local products or eat something at the venues.
- the Cubic houses
- the Eramusburg where you can explor

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.80 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1.5 baths
Condo in Rotterdam · ★4.88 · 3 bedrooms · 4 beds · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview:
Dutch+English
Ons deel van het Nieuwe Westen is rustig, met een grote kinderspeeltuin om de hoek. De buurt stamt uit het begin van de vorige eeuw en de straat staat vol met monumentale kastanjes.

Our part of the neighbourhood is quiet, with a large children's playground around the corner. The neighbourhood originates at the start of the 20th century and the lane is planted with stately chestnut trees.
host_about:
Enjoying life, married, working in a heritage organisation. Love to have dinner with friends or just hang out. I'm a foodie who loves the cinema - but then who isn'nt?

We're both outgoing people interested in art, politics, the world. We spend a lot of time visiting theatre, music and bars.

name: Home in Rotterdam · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview:
Europes largest rowing course surrounded by vast nature, a lot of waterfowl and songbirds.
There's a wide beach and the waterski track at 7 minutes cycling distance at the lake which has many small islands where you can chillout in the sun or watch birds.
Beautiful cycling routes are at your doorstep, as our house is located along one.
We are a 10 minute drive away from boat and kayak rental in a recreation area, 'De Rottermeren'.
host_about:
To experience places of the world is what makes my world bigger. 
When I travel: Bringing home the best local food and habits of a country and share this with my friends and family is what I love to do, and I'm happy to return the favor to you. Discover this region while I'm away and share your experience with your friends!
Using Airbnb on my trips and travels is a great way to get to know the local people..
When I don't travel i live in Rotterdam Netherlands: Often I enjoy a walk around the lake and spot some beautiful birds. Every now and then I can't resist the best raw 'Haring' at the local shop. My garden is a place I feel happy to work in, love active relaxing : ) I work at our company that is specialized in installing luxury bathrooms. Tiling, wiring and administration are my share. And besides that I'm privileged to help people in my practice to get their vitality back by treating them with bioresponse. Very different activities but I like them both very much.

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.83 · 2 bedrooms · 3 beds · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview: An island within the city. Silent and Central.
host_about: Internet entrepreneur

name: Boat in Rotterdam · ★4.88 · 1 bedroom · 16 beds · 7 baths
neighborhood_overview: The lonely planet thinks Rotterdam is a must-see-city and CNN think it's 'Europe's new capitol of cool'. Of course I agree :-) but please visit and find out for yourself!
host_about: A stand-up guy.... ;-)

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.48 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview: Near downtown, and great food in the neighborhood
host_about: Movies and gym

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.78 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is at walking distance (5 min.) from central station in a hip, cozy and quiet neighbourhood Blijdorp. The city center starts directly at the other side of the railway (5 minute walk). The Rotterdam Zoo is within walking distance as well as bars and restaurants.

You can also catch a metro, tram or bus (or train) at central station. It takes a 40 minute train to go to Amsterdam, and within 15 minutes you will be in The Hague.

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★5.0 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview: Stately canals, quiet streets and the beloved Vroesenpark: the Blijdorp district is not just a protected cityscape. The green parks are popular with residents, who sunbathe and barbecue in the summer. The pre-war houses are very suitable for families and the neighborhood offers something for everyone, Diergaarde Blijdorp for the little ones (actually for everyone, of course), dog playground Bello for the four-legged friend and the Roel Langerakpark for the athletes among us. Both train and RandstadRail make the district very accessible.
host_about:
Hi there! I’m Sebastiaan and fond of traveling and hosting to travelers myself!

I’m tidy, respectful, and reliable. Oh and also a good amateur cook!

name: Loft in Rotterdam · ★5.0 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview: Very lively nabourhood but the street is quit. The best musea and best pubs and restaurants are also very close. 500 mtr / 1 km. Many public tranportation (bus, tram Subway) and you can park Your car fairly easy (but paid)
host_about: Till the moment my kids are old enough we rent out the appartment. Mainly for expats who work for Erasmus MC or companies in city Centre. I work as lecturer besides my interim marketing jobs and my wife worked for 11 years UNILEVER in Rotterdam and now for VodafoneZiggo. We have 3 children and have no plans for leaving as we just love the quiet garden but the be also close to the livelihood and endless opportunities of the City Centre.

name: Boat in Rotterdam · ★4.63 · 10 bedrooms · 21 beds · 3 baths
neighborhood_overview:
Men kan plezierig rond de haven naar het Euromast(park) wandelen, uit varen gaan met de Spido havenrondvaart of (snelle) watertaxi gaan lunchen in "Hotel New York" of dwalen over de SS "Rotterdam" !
Musea en Euromast(park) op loopafstand.
Het monumentale scheepvaartkwartier herbergt vele cafe's en restaurants.
Fietsenhuur op loopafstand. (Schiedamsedijk; "Centrum bikes")
Het is goed stappen in de Witte de Withstraat! (400 meter wandelen), Witte Aap, NRC,dan los in de Maassilo, Skihut, BAR, Tofler, Beurs, Beurt, Rotown, Get Back, Villa Thalia, Zimmermann, Stadscafe, etc
host_about:
Uw gastheer is familievader en voert als kapitein samen met vrouw en zonen de zeilrederij Vof Europe Sailing.
Ik woon met familie nabij de te verhuren zeilschepen 'Luciana', 'Catherina' en 'Marie Galant' in de Veerhaven op ons woon/vergaderschip de 'Schoneveld'.
Mijn favoriete reisbestemmingen zijn de te bezeilen landen als Noorwegen, Deense eilanden, Oost en Noordzeekusten en Gomera, La Palma en El Hierro.
Ik heb weinig tijd voor boeken, maar lees graag reisverhalen en (maritieme)geschiedenis.
Mijn vrouw en ik gaan graag met het hele gezin naar de bioscoop.
Ik ben graag gastheer en stel het op prijs vooraf met de klant overleg te voeren, kennis te maken en te peilen wat verlangd wordt.
Bij een verblijf op een schip gaat veiligheid voor alles en dus ben ik dag en nacht mobiel bereikbaar.
Mijn levensmotto is dat wat ik in werktijd mag doen mijn hobby is!

name: Condo in Rotterdam · ★4.96 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1.5 shared baths
neighborhood_overview: Quiet neighbourhood with a lot of green just around the corner of the city centre.
host_about:
Living and working in the heart of Rotterdam. Love food, wine and traveling.

As a worldwide traveler I have traded in staying at hotels for AirBnB years ago. Visiting new places locally and meeting new exciting people is the great result.

As a host I offer my guest bedroom in Rotterdam on AirBnB and truly enjoy hosting guests and meeting new friends from all over the globe!

name: Townhouse in Rotterdam · ★4.79 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview: Within 250 meters there’s a big variety of things that you want nearby: shops, breakfast places, restaurants, cafes, a night shop, and the Emergency Room of the Erasmus University Hospital. There are four superarkets within 700 meters.
host_about: We love to travel and have done so through over 80 countries mainly over land. In Rotterdam we have a company in the hospitality industry called City Safari in which we invite people to visit the superdiverse Rotterdamers in their homes, houses of worship or civic initiatives. This way we help organizations build their diversity program by actually meeting the people who make up the city in person and we invite individuals to explore the city by meeting these people and going places outside the city center.

name: Condo in Rotterdam · ★5.0 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 1.5 baths
host_about:
My name is Nienke and I live in Rotterdam and work in Amsterdam.
I love the city life!

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.97 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview:
Just a few minutes from our front door you'll find the vibrant Witte de With street, Nieuwe Binnenweg and Eendrachts-square on which many restaurants and café's are situated, for either breakfast, lunch, drinks or dinner. Throughout the past years we have been able to try many of these places and would love to share our (culinary) tips with you. Supermarkets, shopping area's, musea and other highlights of the city are all walking distance or easily accessible from our home.

Op enkele minuten lopen vindt u de bruisende Witte de With straat, Nieuwe Binnenweg en Eendrachtsplein waar vele restaurants en cafés gelegen zijn voor zowel ontbijt, lunch, borrel als diner. Gedurende de afgelopen jaren hebben wij veel leuke (culinaire) gelegenheden in Rotterdam en omgeving kunnen uitproberen, waardoor we u kunnen voorzien van insider tips. Verder zijn supermarkten, winkelgelegenheden, musea en andere bezienswaardigheden allen gemakkelijk te bereiken.

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.91 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1.5 shared baths
neighborhood_overview: Best neighbourhood in Rotterdam. There are a mixture of historical and newly built buildings. Also the small harbor, called 'Veerhaven' gives the place a very nice amotsphere. You can see my attached travel guide and see why!
host_about:
Ik zal mezelf kort voorstellen. Mijn naam is Mark, een jonge ondernemer met een grote diversiteit in interesses. In de afgelopen zeven jaar heb ik drie bedrijven opgericht, van enkele webshops tot een innovatieve betaaloplossing. Het geeft mij veel energie om mij bezig te houden met nieuwe oplossingen en ideeën en deze ook daadwerkelijk handen en voeten te geven.

Mijn voornaamste hobby is muziek. Zo speel ik vanaf mijn 7e intensief klassiek piano. Momenteel geef ik ook pianoles en masterclasses. Daarnaast ga ik graag naar muziekfestivals. 

Tot slot ben ik dol op sporten. Squash, fitness, skieën en golf zijn mijn favorieten. 

Op het moment woon ik in het prachtige scheepsvaartskwartier, een van de mooiste plekjes in Rotterdam. Aangezien ik een kamer over heb wil ik deze graag beschikbaar stellen om anderen het gemak en plezier van deze locatie te laten ervaren. 

Inmiddels woon ik al bijna tien jaar in Rotterdam, en ken ik de stad op mijn duimpje. Als verhuurder deel ik deze ervaring dan ook graag  om het optimale uit je verblijf te halen!

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.87 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview:
Wat heeft Rotterdam Noord dat andere Rotterdamse wijken niet hebben?

Het Vroesenpark: de plek om ’s zomers te picknicken, barbecueën en voetballen.

Station Hofplein: onder voormalig treinstation Hofplein vind je unieke winkeltjes met onder meer vintage kleding en meubels, koffiebarretjes, restaurants en jazzclub Bird.

Het Zwaanshals en de Zaagmolenkade: twee straten vol designshops en delicatessen.

Diergaarde Blijdorp: een van de oudste en mooiste dierentuinen van Nederland.
host_about: Hi, I am Petra from the Netherlands. I live in Rotterdam. To discover new cities I really enjoy staying in airbnb houses to feel more of how people living in their city.

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.47 · 2 bedrooms · 6 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview:
Je bevind je pal naast de gezellige Witte de Withstraat, met haar vele leuke en gezellige restaurants en cafés. Café De Witte Aap op de Witte de Withstraat is uitgeroepen tot beste café van de Wereld.

Voor het shoppen ben je lopend binnen 5 minuten in het centrum van winkelend Rotterdam

name: Townhouse in Rotterdam · ★5.0 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 2 baths
host_about: Hi, I'm Frank and I'm excited to share my home with you on Airbnb. My wife Clementine, our two dogs Joe and Jacky, and I have lived in this house for over 25 years. We love sports, dogs, and spending time in France. Our home is cozy and has everything you need for a comfortable stay. Come and enjoy!

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.84 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview: Location: The apartment is situated next to a large canal, in the Historic “Delfshaven“ suburb, conveniently located near the Rotterdam CBD. Walk to the end of the street to find lovely restaurants and bustling bars. Shops and a supermarket are located right across the street!
host_about:
Your Host: My name is Sam. I work part-time as a psychologist. For the last 20 years I have been living in the apartment just below, on the ground floor. Besides in Dutch, I will be able to assist you in English, French and German. When you arrive I would be happy to offer more tips and tricks regarding the Delfshaven area and Rotterdam in general to ensure you have a pleasant stay!

De gastheer:
Mijn voornaam is Sam. In het dagelijks leven werk ik part-time als psycholoog. Ik woon al 20 jaar in het appartement eronder, op de begane grond. Naast Nederlands spreek ik, als je gastheer, ook Engels, Frans en Duits. Bij aankomst ben ik graag bereid je meer informatie te geven over de buurt, en over de stad Rotterdam, om je verblijf hier zo aangenaam mogelijk te maken!

L’hôte
Mon prénom est Sam. Je travaille à temps partiel comme psychologue. Depuis 20 ans j’habite l’appartement au rez-de-chaussée. Comme votre hôte je parle outre le néerlandais la langue anglaise, française et allemande. A votre arrivée j‘aimerais  vous donner de bons avis pour rendre votre séjour au plus agréable. 

Der Gastgeber:
Mein Name ist Sam. Im täglichen Leben  arbeite ich Teilzeit als Psychologe. Schon 20 Jahre wohne  ich direkt unter der Wohnung im Erdgeschoss. Neben Holländisch, spreche ich als Gastgeber Englisch, Französisch und Deutsch. Bei Ankunft gebe ich Ihnen gerne mehr Tipps und Tricks in Bezug auf die Nachbarschaft und Rotterdam, um Ihren Aufenthalt so angenehm wie möglich zu machen!

name: Guesthouse in Rotterdam · ★4.94 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview: The house is situated in hillegersberg, a nice, quiet and historic part of the city with a lot of greenery and lakes. The shopping street is next door, as well as a number of restaurants, bars and terraces. Tram 4 stops within 2 minutes walking distance which takes you to Rotterdam city centre/ central station in 15 minutes. The lakes are around the corner, where boat rental is offered.
host_about: My husband Bas and I have three young boys, twins of seven years old and a four year old. We love traveling, good food and spending time with friends and family.

name: Condo in Rotterdam · ★4.56 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is situated in the area called Provenierswijk and is a haven of tranquillity, in spite of being within close proximity of the city centre. The public park 'Vroesenpark' is located near the complex and is a very vibrant place in the summer with locals getting together.

The area hides different excuisite restaurants like Dunya Locanta, Le Nord and for the pizza lovers there's La Pizza, the best pizza place in Rotterdam. For a coffee there are different great places in and around Central Station. Two supermarkets are on 4 minutes walking distance from the apartment.

Just on the other side of the Central Station is where the vibrant day- and nightlife starts. Different areas for a great night out like Central District, Stadhuisplein, Witte de Withstraat and Oude Binnenweg are within walking distance or easily reachable by public transport.
host_about:
Hi there!

Thanks for looking into my profile! :)
I am a 31 year old Dutch guy, living in the heart of Rotterdam. As I'm writing this (February 2017), I have used Airbnb only for my own travels. In March that will change. I will visit Peru for a month and I'd be happy to let my apartment be of use for you! I am quite thrilled about this trip, as I've never been to South America before and heard great stories about it.

When I am not travelling, I work as a coach for people who depend on a social benefit for their income and have a very long distance to the labour market. I try to help them to work on their problems by coaching them and by connecting them to the right professionals, projects and organizations. Besides work, I like to hang out with friends, travel, run, cycle, go to the gym and play football.

name: Home in Rotterdam · ★4.95 · 3 bedrooms · 4 beds · 1 bath

And around the other corner there's a lake next to a large park with a classic old Dutch windmill. You'll also find shops and pubs less than 500 metres away. And there's a really nice and cosy restaurant just across the street.
host_about: I live in Rotterdam and love travelling, photography and camping.

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.89 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1 bath

The markthall is a 5minutes walk away and the Erasmus bridge about 3 minutes.

name: Home in Rotterdam · ★4.69 · 2 bedrooms · 3 beds · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview: Heel rustige, ruime wijk. Kindvriendelijk, veilig, rustige buren.
host_about: We are a family with 2 children, living partly abroad. We like very much our area as our girls play a lot on the street with all neighbor kids. We also like cycling in the city and enjoying the restaurants in the centre and at the Wilhelmina Pier

name: Condo in Rotterdam · ★4.49 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview: Residential area with  Vroesenpark and Blijdorp Zoo nearby. Easy shopping by supermarkets or  multicultural Zwart Jaanstraat. Jazz club Bird and Annabel nearby.
host_about: Rotterdam is very vibrant, with fascinating architecture, North Sea Jazz, Carribean festival, Rotterdam marathon, World Harbour  Day. Lots of art and music venues. I can easily cycle from my house to club Annabel and see the concert of the famous Bangas & Tangas from New Orleans or pop into Boijmans  mirror depot.  The appartment is cosy 52 m2 two room place with all you basically need and in a good central location.

name: Condo in Rotterdam · ★4.55 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview:
The neighbourhood is lively but not noisy. I live at a 'safe distance' from the city center but close enough to walk and be in the middle of 'the action'.
There are several restaurants close to my home, bars and clubs are mainly situated in the city center.
Close by there is a small shopping center with 2 supermarkets, a snack bar, utilities shop, a drugstore, florist, bakery etc. You will have all you need within hand reach.
if you are feeling like seeking up nature there is the Vroesepark withing 15 minute walk (very popular during warm days and perfects for barbeques) and the Kralingse Bos within a 10 minute drive.

neighborhood_overview:

My street is a small and quiet and children friendly street, with little gardens in front of houses. We are just around the corner of Heemraadsingel, which is one of the most beautiful streets in town. Shopping, supermarkets and restaurants are on walking distance. You can have a coffee and find Restaurants around the corner at the Middelandstraat/ Middelandplein, such as “de burgermeester”, and “ Marseille”.
You can reach the zoo within 5 minutes walking and the upcomming longest shopping street of Holland (Nieuwe Binnenweg) is 10 minutes by walking. There you find pups at the Heemraadsplein, such as STijn and Bakkeliet, vintage and nice flower shops.

The ‘Kralingse plas en bos’ (large lake and forest in the city) is 35minutes on bike and great to rent a boat or SUP.

If you like nature, visit the Biesbosch. A ferry takes you along the Maas river to Dordrecht. A quicker option is by bike and train. You can hire a boat or kayak to experience this beautiful area.
I can provide you all the info you need when you are here.

name: Loft in Rotterdam · ★4.89 · 2 bedrooms · 3 beds · 3.5 baths
neighborhood_overview:
The house is located on the quay of the Maas river in the historical Delfshaven district. Only 20 minutes from Central Station. There are many good and cozy restaurants in this neighborhood. Within walking distance is the old marina. In the old canal houses you can now find antique and curio shops, small distilleries, restaurants and some craft beer breweries.

Because this house is close to several tram stops and a metro stop, the rest of the city is well connected by public transport. You can be at the Museumpark in 10 minutes, at the Maritime museum in 15 minutes and at the boarding point for the boat trips in about 20 minutes.

The "Nieuwe Binnenweg", known for its many nice boutique shops, is only 10 minutes by metro and the Witte de With, the entertainment street with lively bars and many restaurants, is only 12 minutes away.

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.80 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1.5 baths
Home in Rotterdam · ★4.56 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 2 shared baths
Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.86 · 2 bedrooms · 3 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview:
In de omgeving zijn meerder gezellige winkels, restaurantjes, cafés en bezienswaardigheden.
Op 500 meter ligt historisch Delfshaven, een authentiek stukje Rotterdam, met o.a. de Pelgrimskerk, waar de "Pilgrims fathers" in 1620 naar de "nieuwe wereld' zijn vertrokken. In de U.S. nog steeds een begrip.
De bekende zeeheld Piet Hein heeft zijn sporen achtergelaten in deze omgeving.
In Delfshaven liggen bewoonde platbodems en het staat bekend om de pittoreske gevels. Verder is hier stadsbrouwerij de Pelgrim gevestigd.
De Euromast en "Het park" liggen op 1,5 km afstand van het appartement. Dit is een leuke wandeling langs de Schie en brengt u naar de Nieuwe Maas. Waar de Haven van Rotterdam zichtbaar wordt.
In deze omgeving zijn er veel toeristische attracties te vinden. Onder andere de Veerhaven, het Wereld museum, de Kunsthal, het Depot van Boijmans etc..
U kunt met de waterbus naar Dordrecht en Kinderdijk varen, een rondvaart door de Rotterdamse hav
host_about:
Hallo,
Als ik thuis ben en mijn koffie drink kijk ik graag naar de vrachtschepen die voorbij varen. Dit geeft mij het gevoel in een havenstad te wonen.
Ik maak graag wandelingen door de stad en drink mijn biertje in toeristisch Delfshaven wat 5 min lopen van mijn huis ligt. 
Hier ligt veel geschiedenis van de stad. Vanuit deze plek is Rotterdam min of meer uitgebouwd. Het is daar rustig en mooi. Het lijkt een beetje op Amsterdam met zijn grachten en pakhuiswoningen.

Ik ben een creatief persoon en ben graag fysiek bezig.
In mijn B&B zul je de sfeer van creativiteit kunnen proeven.
De inrichting van heel mijn huis heb ik in de stijl van het huis wat in 1924 gebouwd is. Bovendien is het een bewuste keuze om te recycelen.

Naast mijn benb vind ik het heerlijk om in mijn tuin te tuinieren.  Ik schilder graag en maak tassen. 
Ik help anderen hun huis te reorganiseren en opknappen.
Dus u zou mij in kluskleding aan kunnen treffen ;-)

Sinds kort bezit ik een camperbusje. Ik ben daar erg blij mee en ga graag naar natuulijke campings waar het vaak mooi, rustig en vriendelijk is. Bovendien is daar qua natuur veel te beleven.

Katendrecht is the old Red light district, has become very trendy and has also a small parc. You can easily travel by waterbus or watertaxi. name: Townhouse in Rotterdam · ★4.95 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 2 baths
neighborhood_overview:
Kralingen is traditionally known as the chiquer side of Rotterdam. Romantic villa neighbourhoods and elegant lanes dominate the cityscape here. Erasmus University Rotterdam is also located here, however, so the area is home to lots of students – and they keep Kralingen lively! Oostzeedijk boasts lots of popular pubs and restaurants where you can pick up a meal for a reasonable price. One of the oldest attractions in Kralingen is Arboretum Trompenburg. In addition to the lovely old trees here, these botanic gardens offer beautiful plants and flowers and a charming teahouse.

The biggest park in Rotterdam is nearby: the Kralingse Bos, a green oasis for everyone hoping to escape the city for a breath of fresh air and some peace and quiet. Visitors rollerblade, jog and cycle around the lake to their heart’s content. Sailboats skim across the lake, while tasty snacks are served at sidewalk cafés along the waterfront.
host_about:
Hi! My name is Renee, an energetic and positive woman, and I want to welcome you in my urban meets industry house in one of the most vibrant cities of the world. Rotterdam is my hometown and I love to tell you about my favorites local spots and the culture of Rotterdam.
I was born and raised in Rotterdam and I working in the sales department of our shipyard in Rotterdam, so I can tell you all about it!

name: Serviced apartment in Rotterdam · ★4.73 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview:
Witte de Withstraat is the place to be when visiting Rotterdam. It has many restaurants that are open till late and amazing bars with seating outside. It is a two minute walk to the nearest tube station and three minute walk to the shopping district.

Furthermore it is nearby the Coolsingel which houses the Rotterdam City hall, and it's nearby the shopping boulevard of the city. If you don't like the big shops you can also visite the small boutiques on the Van Oldenbarneveldstraat, Karel Doormanstraat or de Meent.
If you have a panache for art, local products or like to buy things from local artists, entrepreneurs, hobbyist/amateurs, the Witte de Withstraat is dotted with (vintage and pop-up) shops/boutiques & galleries that sell these.

It's a 10 minute walk from:
- the newly constructed Markthal, which you really should visite to buy some local products or eat something at the venues.
- the Cubic houses
- the Eramusburg where you can explor

In Noord, daar moet je wezen. Deze uitgestrekte lappendeken van een stadsdeel barst van de wijken en buurten met ieder een eigen verrukkelijk karakter. De wijk is de afgelopen jaren in een stroomversnelling geraakt, zoals dat in zoveel steden gebeurt, maar zonder zijn ouderwetse glans te verliezen. Oude en nieuwe Noorderlingen, gezinnen en studenten, jongeren en ouderen en mensen uit talloze culturen leven hier vredig naast elkaar en dat brengt een sfeer met zich mee zoals nergens anders in de stad. neighborhood_overview: Our house is 15 minute walk from the city. Although you can also find everything in West. For a good coffee and lunch you can go to the Urban Espresso or Roast. For organic grocery’s you have to be at Ecoplaza or Gimsel (bit more far). If you want to eat a pizza you can go to De Buffel or get your meal at Fou. For a drink in West you can go to Steyn, Bakeliet and Rijke en de wit. Enjoy!

name: Townhouse in Rotterdam · ★5.0 · 4 bedrooms · 4 beds · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview:
The house is close to the center, 5 minutes cycling or 10 minutes in the tram. In the attractive district you will find some nice shops and restaurants. The Bergse Plassen (small lakes) are nearby (boat rental, SUP or swimming). Also go for a walk or bike ride along the river Rotte or in the Bergse Bos.

If you come with young children, you will find a large playground, a football pitch, a smaller playground, a nice children's book shop / coffee shop and a unique amusement park in the neighborhood: Plaswijck Park. We also have a lot of toys (girls).
host_about: Living in Rotterdam, The Netherlands, with our family of 4. Loves to travel the world in a sustainable way. Loves cycling and walking.

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.96 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview: Delfshaven is a great neighborhood to stay in in Rotterdam. It is the oldest remaining part of the city. From the 1700’s only 1 minute walk away. It is a 10 min walk to the city centre but also quiet enough to enjoy a nice walk along the river. There are multiple grocery stores within 600m walking from the house, besides that there are a lot of little shops, restaurants, kebab shops (for the late night snack) and other facilities.

name: Townhouse in Rotterdam · ★4.82 · Studio · 1 bed · 1 private bath
neighborhood_overview: Besides shopping and night life Rotterdam has lots to offer cultural such as museums and art.

name: Boat in Rotterdam · ★4.85 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview: Rothor is moored in the Haringvliet, one of the historic harbours of Rotterdam, located in the centre.  Next to the Rothor is the bridge to the Oude Haven (Old Harbour). In the Old Harbour you can sit and have a drink by the water. There are bars and restaurants. In the harbours, Leuvehaven, Haringvliet, Oude Haven and Wijnhaven are filled with classic Dutch boats. The area is a mix of very old warehouses, bridges, ships, bars and modern skyscraper apartment buildings. The very famous and striking Kubic Houses are just around the corner. A little bit further is the Markthal a very remarkable building, not to be missed when you visit Rotterdam!
host_about:
I'm an entrepreneur in the leisure field in Rotterdam.
I like meeting people from all parts of the world.
I  enjoy travelling and checking out other B&B's abroad.
I can give my guests a lot of information about Rotterdam and its attractions.
I enjoy rebuilding classic boats in an authentic nautical style.

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.85 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview: 3mins walking distance to Rotterdam central station, 2.5 hours to Paris by train , 26 mins to Amsterdam airport by train. All the subways , tram have a stop here.
host_about: Travel blogger and host of a travel radio channel. Into interior design and delicious food. Can speak English, 中文 and Dutch , feel free for asking questions about the house by the language you’re familiar with.

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.93 · 2 bedrooms · 3 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview: Oostplein is Oostplein. In our opinion the best location in town. We are at walking distance to city center, Blaak station, Oude Haven, cubic houses, Maas river, Kralingse Bos. Right in the corner of our apartment, you have many bars where you can drink a huge variety of beers (Attention: COVID 19 measures may affect this), a tram stop, a metro stop, and a water taxi stop. You can rent a bike in our same street which we highly recommend. Bikes are the best way to explore Rotterdam.
host_about:
I'm from Montevideo, Uruguay, travel a lot through south america, sometimes to the states.
Now for the first time in Europe, doing MBA in Rotterdam.

name: Houseboat in Rotterdam · ★4.38 · 4 bedrooms · 8 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview: The harbor is situated in the very multicural and up coming neighborhood 'kop van zuid'
host_about: Hi, me and my wife are really boat lovers! This is the reason why we turned this beautiful old cargo vessel into a lovely nice city apartment / loft. This will give you the unique opportunity to live for a few day;s in an ancient vessel. As real Rotterdam people we can tell you about all the nice things the city of Rotterdam has to explore, such as good bars and food and culture. We are delighted to welcome you on board!

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.89 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1.5 baths
host_about: Hi there, I fell instantly in love with my renovated apartment. I like to go on short trips within the Netherlands and rent out my place via Airbnb during these occasions.

name: Home in Rotterdam · ★4.90 · 3 bedrooms · 3 beds · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is lively and has a great mixture of authentic and hot spots. The Binnenweg, has a variety of shops and supermarkets amongst others an organic/biological supermarket. Here you'll find Vlaams Broodhuys which serves great breakfast, lunch and coffee. Apart form the famous roti’s, Indonesian, Dominican, Thai, African food, there are many options in vegetarian and vegan food as well. Don't miss out on the vegan cupcakes at Heavenly cupcakes!. The house is located 15 minutes walking distance from many museums and other sightseeing spots for example the “Witte de Withstraat” with café’s, restaurants, museums and art galleries.

name: Condo in Rotterdam · ★5.0 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.59 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview:
You live in blijdoorp (translated: happy village); a lush, authentic & dynamic neighborhood behind the city center.
Here you find several restaurants, pubs, supermarkets & everything you might occasionally need. With only 10 minutes walking distance from the city centre & Rotterdam's central station, so you have all the options. You can easily jump on a train to explore other beautiful dutch cities Utrecht, Amsterdam or Den Hague, or even go to the beach at Hook van Holland...
The house opens to a beautiful view. Where there used to be a monestry garden, there is now a small neighbourhood tennis court, surrounded by big trees. If it wasn't for the tiny bit of skyline, you would almost forget that you are in the city with the biggest haven in Europe!
host_about: Hi, My name is Luca and I like traveling, meeting new people and discovering new places and experiences. Don't hesitate to ask me anything. I am happy to help.

name: Houseboat in Rotterdam · ★4.81 · 2 bedrooms · 3 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview: The Maritime District is the most beautiful area of Rotterdam; it has it all: musea (Maritiem Museum, Mariniersmuseum & Comics Museum), loads of ho(s)tels, many highraise buildings and great restaurants. The area is very safe, peaceful and quiet at streetlevel.

name: Loft in Rotterdam · ★4.94 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview:
Kralingen is een geliefde wijk in Rotterdam vlakbij het centrum. Leuke ontbijt winkeltjes en diverse supermarkten op 5 minuten lopen. Openbaar vervoer in de buurt of huur fietsen en ontdek Rotterdam per fiets........
Musea in de buurt en veel mooie natuur. Het Kralingse bos is op 10 minuten afstand.
host_about:
Wij zijn Liesbeth & Isabelle. 
Liesbeth werkt bij een gerenommeerd architectenbureau en Isabelle gaat in de buurt naar de allerleukste school!  Wij wonen met veel plezier in Rotterdam en kennen alle leuke plekken in de stad. We zijn gek op onze Peugeot oldtimer, houden van lekker, eerlijk en gezond eten (maken en nuttigen) en genieten van mooie kunst en cultuur. We verwelkomen je graag in ons zelf gerenoveerde huis, waar wij ook zelf wonen.

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.86 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
host_about:
My flat is located at the best area of the city of Rotterdam. I guarantee you will enjoy the neighborhood like a local. It's very central. Besides that you can take the metro, bus, train, scooter and any bike to explore so many places abroad.
I will be happy to help you during your stay with some tips and ideas!

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.68 · 2 bedrooms · 3 beds · 1 bath
host_about:
Hi World,

I'm a cultural entrepreneur (visual artist and gallery owner) and I have a restoration/ renovation company (Monumental buildings). As a visual artist my fields are painting, sculpture and photography. As a master painter my expertises are restoration of monumental buildings, plastering, glass and durable work/ environment.
My interest are,people, literature, art, cultures, music, environment, cuisines and many more.

Kind regards

name: Condo in Rotterdam · ★4.85 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview:
Located in the heart of the city, just behind the City hall.

Shopping areas, restaurants and bars are just around the corner. All major sight seeings are within walking distance.

You won't find an apartment more centrally located than this one. Enjoy the city life!
host_about:
Hi, 

I am Saskia, single, lawyer. I have been living and working in Rotterdam for about 30 years. In July 2015 I bought the apartment in the Timmerhuis (casco), and I moved in at the end of 2015. 
I live there with a lot of pleasure! The location is fantastic, I have very nice neighbors and the apartment itself has everything I could want. But the terraces are my pride and joy, and also the main reason for buying the apartment. I have what you call in Dutch "green fingers."

Because of a major leak, which fortunately has now been fixed, I was unable to accept bookings for a year.  This was followed by the Covid pandemic. 

I look forward to hearing your experiences! 

Greetings, 
Saskia

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.96 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview: The City Shopping center and restaurants, Zoo Blijdorp and Casino are on walking distance of the apartment.

name: Guest suite in Rotterdam · ★4.81 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 private bath
neighborhood_overview: Rotterdam Noord (North) is an up-and-coming neighbourhood, perfect if you have a passion for fashion, design and food. The area has become popular recently since its discovery by local artists and creative professionals. Here you can find some of the cutest local restaurants, coffee bars and design stores in the city.
host_about: I am Greek, living in The Netherlands for the last 8 years. I love cooking, cats and black-and-white drawings. In my free time, I enjoy reading a good book or discovering new local businesses in my lovely city, Rotterdam.

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.90 · 3 bedrooms · 4 beds · 1.5 baths
host_about: Sportieve vader van twee fantastische kinderen.

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★5.0 · 2 bedrooms · 1 bed · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview: Although the house is so close to the citycenter, this is a quit and friendly street. It’s close to Blijdorp with it’s nice park and restaurant. Everything is close and public transport nearby.
host_about: I have been living in Rotterdam for 25 years. I live with my daughter Isa (2009) in our cute little house, we’re in the north of the city (the area called: ‘Liskwartier’). I absolutely love this city and know it very well. I’m the no-nonense type of person. I love traveling, meeting people, trying new things, eating, friends, good Coffee, being outside, in and on the water, surfing, art, design and culture. I’m running a mobile catering (kitchen build in a oldtimer truck) were I’m also the chef. I mostly work on filmsets all cross the country, cooking from my mobile kitchen for the crew. I work hard, but I work to live, not live to work.

neighborhood_overview: Het altijd levendige Witte de With met diverse restaurants en keukens. Bars waaronder de nummer 1 bar van de wereld “de witte aap”.

name: Townhouse in Rotterdam · ★4.70 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview:
Prepare to be charmed by neighborhoods full of fresh-faced bikers, exquisite architecture, and locals who may speak English better than you... ;)

You are very welcome to watch these inspiring videos, curtesy of Koen Samson, about the four seasons in Rotterdam!
Autumn - https://vimeo.com/150768299
Winter - https://vimeo.com/159932613
Spring - https://vimeo.com/171542577
Summer - https://vimeo.com/184653049
host_about:
I'm from the Netherlands and I travel together with my daughter 
We really like cycling.

name: Townhouse in Rotterdam · ★4.75 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview: Gezinsbuurt in het centrum van rotterdam. Woning gemakkelijk vanaf treinstation Rotterdam Centraal bereikbaar per tram. Openbaar vervoer makkelijk te bereiken vanaf de woning. Tram op 3 min lopen. Metro iets verder. Stad ook te bereiken per fiets (1 fiets op aanvraag gratis ter beschikking) eventueel mogelijk fiets te huren, bijvoorbeeld op het treinstation. Veel winkeltjes, cafeetjes en restaurantjes in het centrum. Aanrader de Kop van Zuid met Hotel New York, en het Deliplein. Ook de Witte de Withstraat is leuk voor cafés en restaurantjes. Voor winkelen oa de Meent. De mooie dierentuin Blijdorp is in de buurt. Verschillende musea, waaronder de Kunsthal. Daarnaast toeristische trekpleisters als de kubuswoningen en de Euromast. Maar vergeet zeker niet de Erasmusbrug aan de Maas in de avond in het donker.
host_about: Ik ben een 31 jarige vrouw. Hoewel ik mijn hele leven in de stad heb gewoond houd ik veel van de natuur en van dieren.

name: Condo in Rotterdam · ★4.86 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is situated in a very nice neighborhood behind Central Station. The station is about 900 meters walk and there you will find yourself in the hart of Rotterdam which offers the nicest cafes, restaurants, museums, galleries, shops and cinemas, the museum park with Museum Boymans and De Kunsthal, the authentic Witte the Withstraat, the Binnenweg, China Town with several small toko's is all within walking distance.

Exploring the city by electric scooter is the best way.
With the electric scooter you can go to the nearby parks such as Vroesenpark and off course a "must see" Kralingse Bos. You can go to the center or take a walk along the river Maas, cross the Erasmus bridge and go by watertaxi to different parts of the city.

With public transportation nearby you can reach all different parts of the city with their own charme and character.
Public transport is nearby with tram around the corner and a subway station within 5 minutes walk.
host_about:
Hi, my name is Harald and I live in the beautiful and upcoming city of Rotterdam. I love to travel and discover the world. But coming home after another adventure always brings a smile to my face. This is because this city is my home and my home is my sanctuary. I appreciate and enjoy it a lot and I hope you will too.
Life is short, so enjoy as much as you can!

name: Hotel in Rotterdam · ★4.72 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 2 shared baths
neighborhood_overview: CityHub is the perfect base from which you can explore Rotterdam. We are in the most lively and hip street of the city, right where it all happens. Many of the cultural highlights are just around the corner and Central Station is a 15-minute walk away.
host_about: CityHub represents a new generation of travellers that has emerged from today’s interactive and interdependent world. At CityHub they ENJOY, INTERACT and SHARE their experiences and so jointly create a base from which they explore the beautiful cities of the world.
