Ik deel graag over mijn reizen, mijn leven in Rotterdam en over mijn werk als juf van jonge  Nieuwkomers in Rotterdam.

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.94 · 2 bedrooms · 3 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview: Rotterdam Blijdorp is a green oasis of tranquility and  space, closely located to the busy center of Rotterdam. Blijdorp is one of the most desirable residential areas of the city with diverse restaurants, cafes and bars, a park and the Rotterdam Zoo.

name: Condo in Rotterdam · ★4.95 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview: Rotterdam Blijdorp / Bergpolder is a very friendly and affluent neighborhood.  Many children are raised here by young professional couples, and people are very open minded. On the corner of the street you will find your groceries, drugstore, florists and fun boutiques.  Across the street is a professional Beauty Bar where you can get a massage, solarium, or your nails done. One block away you can even get pierced or tattooed...! If I won’t welcome you personally, I will have the keys at Pleur, a concept store across of my apartment.
host_about:
Hi there!

My name is Daan, I am 29 years old and have been living in Rotterdam for the past five years. 

I love traveling to the Middle East, but my favorite city in the world is Melbourne! 

If you rent my apartment you will not only enjoy the happy spirit it carries, but also the many convenient facilities of my neighborhood. You are a 12 min walk from Rotterdam Central Station, the tram is just a footstep away and within 7 minutes you are at the Metro towards The Hague or Rotterdam South. And within three minutes you are on the highway to Amsterdam, Schiphol, Utrecht or Breda.

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.83 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview: Located in the Old Dutch Quarter, one of the rare neighbourhoods not destroyed during the war. Beautiful Dutch architecture and canals. Top restaurants, cafes and bars are only 3 minutes walking.
host_about: We’ve been living in Rotterdam since 2012 and we’re truly passionate about this amazing city

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.58 · 2 bedrooms · 4 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview: Kralingen is a nice old neighbourhood with  a fun mix of multiculti, big villa's and student life. You can take a walk in the park, find a nice place to eat or get your groceries from the local Albert Heyn supermarket.

name: Boat in Rotterdam · ★4.86 · 9 bedrooms · 27 beds · 2 shared baths
neighborhood_overview:
Het schip 'Castor' heeft haar ligplaats aan de Wilhelminapier in Rotterdam, ook wel het Manhattan aan de Maas genoemd.
Op 500 meter het Nieuwe Luxor theater.
Op 150 meter de cruiseterminal.
Nabij het centrum en Ahoy.
Diverse restaurants op loopafstand.
host_about:
Hi!
Ik ben Mario en eigenaar van het schip te samen met mijn vrouw Eelke.
Wij exploiteren het schip zowel stilliggend voor de wal als varend.
Wij wonen ook aan boord met onze hond, maar hebben ons privé verblijf.
Wij hopen u graag aan boord te mogen verwelkomen en u een onvergetelijk verblijf te mogen bieden.

name: Home in Rotterdam · ★4.77 · 3 bedrooms · 4 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview: Het huis grenst aan een groot park, in het park zijn meerdere speeltuinen en er is een hertenkamp. Op 3 minuten loopafstand is een groot betaalde speeltuin, de entree is 0,50 cent per persoon. De winkelstraat met verschillende vis, vlees, brood, kleding, etc is op 4 minuten fietsafstand of 15 minuten loopafstand. Rotterdam/Den Hague airport is op 5 minuten afstand met de auto. Diergaarde Blijdorp is op 10 minuten afstand en Rotterdam Centrum op 15 minuten afstand met de bus, auto of fiets.
host_about: Ik ben Carmilla, ik woon met mijn gezin in ons heerlijk huis vlakbij het centrum van Rotterdam. We houden enorm van reizen en gaan er zo veel mogelijk op uit met onze camper. Als we op reis zijn verhuren we onze woning zodat andere van het heerlijke plekje kunnen genieten. We halen zo veel mogelijk persoonlijke spullen weg om je verblijf zo aangenaam mogelijk te maken.

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.77 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 shared bath
Loft in Rotterdam · ★5.0 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview:
Kralingen is full of beautifull buildings and restaurant cuisines from all over the world.

Also it is only 7 minutes by bike from the authentic buildings of Kralingen, to the metropolitan city center of Rotterdam.

- The tram (stops 100m from loft), also availible for transport.

- Next to the loft there are two restaurants which serve amazing breakfast, lunch and diner.

- For further tips have a look in the “Book of answer” which will be provided after you make an reservation.
host_about:
Dear Guests, 

I love Rotterdam where I have been living for the past 25 years! I rent my charming loft because I like traveling. If you decide to stay at my place, you will never regret it.

Please visit the surrounding as I live around the corner from a big lake/forest and lots of exquisite restaurants and the Erasmus University. 

My house has a real Dutch old "Herenhuis" atmosphere as well as my garden.
Welcome to Kralingen!
Cheers, 
Caro

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★5.0 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview: Mijn appartement is heel centraal gelegen. Het is nog geen 500m van de bekende Markthal en Kubus woningen (the Cube Houses) vandaan, en op 5 minuten lopen vanaf treinstation Blaak. Op 100m afstand van de Maasboulevard waar je lekker langs de rivier de Maas kan wandelen of hardlopen. Erasmus Universiteit is 3 haltes met de metro of 10 minuten fietsen.
host_about: Wij zijn Vincent & Tessa. Een spontaan, ambitieus en ondernemend stel. Wij houden van reizen en vinden het leuk om andere AirBnB plekken te ontdekken. Wij werken in finance en als interieurstylist in Rotterdam.

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview: This neighbourhood is very popular because it has some great area's: a park on top of an old trainstation in the sky and an airtunnel (a must see! And a nice walk), little stores and galleries at 'de hofbogen', hipster coffeeshops, vintagestores, Vroezenpark and much more!
host_about:
Hi! 

Nice to meet you! 

My name is Gwen. I work as a freelance creative and researcher for television and documentary film. My work is my passion. I love people, cultures, art, design, journalisme and basically I really enjoy life! Sounds cheesy doesn't it .. sorry I cant help it .. I just do!

I hope my cozy and vintage-art house will give you as much inspiration and joy as it gives me. And that Rotterdam will be an experience you will always remember. 
I live in a neighbourhood that is one of the hotspots in Rotterdam. Creatives and artist live her. It's filled with nice coffeeshops (the ones with coffee! ;)) and quality restaurants. 

A few of the finest bars and discotheques are in 5 minute walking distance and the city is a 10 minute walk! Where you find even more places to party or have dinner or a drink. 

I hope my house is a place where you feel comfortable, welcome and most of all inspired. 

Hope  to see you soon!

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.93 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.85 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1.5 shared baths
host_about: I am an independent graphic designer, have several free-lance jobs and at the moment I work as a location manager at the refugee shelter for Ukrainian refugees. My daughter moved out to live on her own, good for her :) Now it's only me in my apartment so I have two rooms for guests. I really like hosting people who are visiting my beautiful town Rotterdam! I try to live as sustainable as possible and hope my guests will do the same. When hosting I expect to have respectful and clean guests. In exchange, I will offer you the best of my hospitality:) Night owls and party-people better book at an airbnb location where the host doesn't live as well.

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.88 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview: We live in a friendly neighbourhood in Rotterdam West, close to the Witte de Withstraat and Nieuwe Binnenweg, where you can find a lot of the nice bars and restaurants Rotterdam has to offer. The museum district is within 2 km, where you can find museums on architecture, modern art and natural history. Of course you can ask us anything, so we can advice you on the nice places!

name: Home in Rotterdam · ★4.79 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview:
The heritage lodges are situated in the middle of the Kralingse Bos (forest), a green oasis in the heart of the city of Rotterdam.

Right next to the lodge you’ll find a nice restaurant which offers breakfast, lunch and dinner. The Kralingse Bos is a wonderful recreational area with all sorts of things to do. There’s for example a small beach, a sailing school, petting zoo, deer park, golf club and climbing park. And if you feel like popping into town, the centre of Rotterdam is just 3 metro stops away.

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★5.0 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview:
The reason i wanted to live in this area is because it is very international. There is several bruin cafe's (dutch pubs) in the area and many different restaurants, Surinam, italian, turkish, Dutch, polish and many supermarkets.
Besides that there is a brandnew 50 m swimming pool and also a Japanese centre (Shofukan) nearby that hosts teaceremonies in their teagarden on request.
There is the huge 5 km wide Zuiderpark on 5 minutes walking.
The historical Delfshaven is on a 10 minute bikeride, through the bikingtunnel under the river that is quite an experience for most foreigners.

name: Hotel in Rotterdam · ★4.10 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 private bath
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood of Kralingen has a variety of restaurants, museums and great architecture at its doorstep. Looking to explore the rest of the city and don't feel like walking? Grab one of our designer bikes!

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.89 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is situated in the neighbourhood of Bergpolder, in Rotterdam Noord. This is a green and residential area, which is is very safe and silent at night. The area is located at 6 minutes walk from the Eudokiaplein department store with restaurants and supermarkets. To reach the centre, you can either bike (5 minutes) or take the tram 25 for three stops.
host_about: I am a young professional from Italy living in the Netherlands. I love sports, travelling and reading

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.92 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1.5 shared baths
host_about: I am an independent graphic designer, have several free-lance jobs and at the moment I work as a location manager at the refugee shelter for Ukrainian refugees. My daughter moved out to live on her own, good for her :) Now it's only me in my apartment so I have two rooms for guests. I really like hosting people who are visiting my beautiful town Rotterdam! I try to live as sustainable as possible and hope my guests will do the same. When hosting I expect to have respectful and clean guests. In exchange, I will offer you the best of my hospitality:) Night owls and party-people better book at an airbnb location where the host doesn't live as well.

name: Hotel in Rotterdam · ★4.72 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 private bath
host_about:
UNWIND IN COMFORTABLE LUXURY
Looking for a design hotel in the city centre of Rotterdam? The James is the latest place to stay in the heart of the city. We are right by Central Station, in the most vibrant and lively part of town.

The James is unique in the three-star segment with 144 beautiful rooms. As a design hotel we come with stylish interiors, but we also offer great quality, outstanding hospitality and superb suggestions to experience our cosmopolitan city to the fullest. Staying at The James is all about enjoying our warmly decorated, comfortable and indulging spaces as if they are yours. The James is where you renew, recover and refresh after a busy day in bustling Rotterdam.

“Enjoy the warm ambiance, the comfortable luxury and the special services of The James Hotel”

We like to share this house wich others, in this beautiful neighbourhoud , with great vieuw and nice people. 

I'm a yoga teacher ( you can practise with me if you like) or use my yogaroom. I love the sea, i love animals, i love nature & i love to dance. Dimitri is a sporty man with great passion for kitesurf & Tai Chi.

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.82 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1.5 baths

There are some bars and restaurants close by and you can rent a bike just around the corner.
host_about: Freelancer / adviseur

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.67 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 shared bath
neighborhood_overview: The Provenierswijk has a stately and rustic character and is characterized by the two beautiful pre-war canals and beautiful mansions. You will find all conceivable city amenities nearby. Walk around the corner and discover nice hotspots in the Proveniersstraat. The city center is very easy to reach (within 5 minutes by bike).

name: Home in Rotterdam · ★4.54 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview:
De woning is gelegen in een gezellige en rustige omgeving waar de buren elkaar goed kennen. Op 3 min loop afstand is er een winkel straat met supermarkten, een slagerij, bakker, wasserette, sigarenboer, postkantoor, Kruidvat, bank/pinautomaat ING.
Begin van de straat is er ook een pinautomaat van de ABN AMRO het is zeer veilig want de pinautomaat bevind zich op de dorpsweg. Tegen over de pinautomaat bevinden zich fastfood restaurants (halal) : burger zaak, Turkse eettent en een kiprestaurant. Aan de overkant bevind zich een kleine supermarkt en een slagerij dit is een gezellige straat met veel sfeer. Aan het einde van de straat bevind zich een Chinese afhaal restaurant een Surinaamse toko en Een selfservice wasserette.
host_about:
Ik ben een 24 jarige Nederlandse student woonachtig in Nederland in Parijs. 
Ik volg momenteel de HBO Opleiding international business and languages, ik zit in mijn 3e leerjaar. Ik reis veel en ben weinig thuis. 
Ik ben sociaal, open en levendig.
Mijn hobby's zijn lezen, reizen en zwemmen. 
Mijn droom is om uiteindelijk te wonen en werken in Parijs en vanuit daar verder de wereld te ondekken.

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 2 baths
neighborhood_overview: There are two supermarkets located just around the corner. For the main attractions, like Markthal, Euromast Tower, Erasmus Bridge, Kunsthal you can take the public transport (tram or metro) or a 20-25-minute walk. If you are arriving at Schiphol Airport – there is a direct train to Rotterdam Central Station (25 minutes). There are enough parking facilities nearby the apartment.

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.93 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview:
The story of the city, the bombardment and reconstruction, and the drive to innovate that locals still use today to shape their city all make Rotterdam a fascinating place to visit. Everything seems possible here, and there’s so much left to explore. Rotterdam is a young, dynamic global city, continuously renewing itself at a rapid rate. Sparkling skyscrapers, an impressive port, trendy restaurants and food markets, renowned museums and awesome festivals are the direct result of the can-do mentality of the Rotterdammers. Add to that the many extraordinary attractions and city tours – by bike, bus, boat or on foot – and you understand why Rotterdam was voted Lonely Planet’s Best In Travel 2016.
There are some flyers in the apartment, but visit Rotterdam Tourist Information at the Coolsingel and rotterdam.info to prepare your visit to Rotterdam.
host_about:
Hi! Ik ben Olga! 
Werkzaam als docent van jongeren met gedragsproblematiek en/of een verstandelijke beperking. Ik hou van reizen (met name citytrips of fly/drives), koken en de natuur! Meestal gebruik makend van airbnb, vanwege de bijzondere plekjes i.p.v. de massa hotels en parken! Ik ben een echt stadsmens en werk ook middenin de stad, maar vertrek wanneer mogelijk naar mijn buitenhuisje in de natuur. Op die momenten verhuur ik mijn appartement aan max 2 mensen die van de mooie stad Rotterdam willen genieten en vanuit mijn appartement de stad te voet kunnen of willen verkennen.

Hi! My name is Olga!
I am a teacher, but I also work as a coach for young individuals with an intellectual disability or behavioral issues. I love traveling, most of the time citytrips or fly/drives, cooking and nature! I don’t like the big hotels with loudy tourist, so normally I book nice and special places by Airbnb! I really love living in the city and also work in the center, but in weekends I often leave to my small house a few miles away in nature. When I leave, I like to rent my apartment to max 2 people who want to enjoy the lovely city of Rotterdam!

name: Guest suite in Rotterdam · ★4.93 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview: Het Liskwartier is een levendige buurt met veel horeca voorzieningen. Op loopafstand (<10min) bevinden zich diverse hotspots om koffie te drinken, een hapje te eten of een borreltje te doen!

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.66 · 2 bedrooms · 4 beds · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview:
Located close to a vibrant neighborhood, you'll find a variety of shops and restaurants within a 3-minute walk on Nieuwe Binnenweg. Some highlights include:
Multiple supermarkets, including an organic option for those seeking healthier choices.
A wide selection of restaurants and bars catering to various tastes and preferences.
Conveniently situated just 400 meters away from the 'Dijkzigt' metro station and Erasmus University.
Excellent access to tram and metro services, with stations just a few minutes away, ensuring effortless transportation.
host_about:
Salut, Hi, Ola, Ni hao, Hoi, I'm French and my close friends call me Jon. I have an IT background. I love football and discovering new places and foods from all around the world. 
As a host, guests say that I'm quick to answer and always available for any requests or questions. Make yourself comfortable at our place as long as you keep it tidy and clean. Our place is nice, well located but for that price don't expect luxury because the simplest things are the best.

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.73 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview:
Lovely loft in best street ligt op een centrale locatie in Rotterdam.

Het appartement beschikt over 1 slaapkamer, een flat screen-tv en een volledig uitgeruste keuken met een vaatwasser, een koelkast, een wasmachine en een oven.

Het appartement beschikt over een hot tub.

Populaire bezienswaardigheden in de buurt van de Lovely Loft zijn onder andere Markthal Rotterdam, Cube Houses en Oude Haven. De dichtstbijzijnde luchthaven is Rotterdam The Hague, op 9 km van de accommodatie.

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 shared bath
Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.89 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 2 baths
neighborhood_overview: The studio is next to the cinema, chinatown, central station, shopping center, restaurants, bar etc.
host_about:
Hi, we are Jun, (Brother ) and Yi Jen (Sister). We are a friendly and easy going siblings who stay at the downtown area of Rotterdam. We enjoy making friends with different people around the world and understand their diversified culture. We love traveling and appreciate the little things in life! Also, we enjoy yummy food, a cup of good coffee and cooking at home too. 

We look forward to meeting all guests who choose to stay at our humble residence. It is our pleasure to have you and we do hope to keep in touch in the future. Our residence is spacious, warm and cozy. We hope all guests will feel at home and able to enjoy every moment in Rotterdam to the fullest. Do let us know if you need any help and recommendations as we will be glad to assist you!

It requires fate for you to choose our residence and for us to have you as our guest. Do send us a message for inquiry and booking! Look forward to hear from you all out there! 

Cheers! :)

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.96 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview:
The house is on a quiet broad green canal with many trees. At the rear of the house are large gardens with lots of greenery.
The very light house is decorated with a lot of art. Immediately around the corner is one of the longest shopping streets in the Netherlands with supermarkets, delis, cafes and restaurants. Nearby is the historic center of Delfshaven.
The house is a 10-minute walk from the large city park with Euromast.
Museums are close by. Metro, bus and tram are around the corner. The Central Station is easily accessible by public transport.
host_about:
Delen is altijd ons motto geweest. Omdat ik als beeldend kunstenaar zowel in Blanchefosse werk als in Rotterdam staan de huizen om de beurt leeg. 
In de zomer hebben we tot nu toe het grote huis in Frankrijk gebruikt voor cursussen. De grote multifunctionele zaal/atelier is daar perfect voor en kan ook gebruikt worden voor familie reünies.

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★5.0 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview:
Kralingse plas, a wonderful lake and park, is within 1 minute walking distance.

“Lusthofstraat” offers grocery stores, shopping, and things such as hair dressers and beauty salons. It’s about 3 to 4 minutes walk.

The Erasmus university and Brain-park are about 800m away, and can easily be reached by foot/bike within several minutes.

Flex-bikes, something similar to Airbnb but then to rent bikes per minute, are frequently stationed just around the corner. Making it easy to rent a bike for a small fee when you need it.

There’s a lot more going on, and ample restaurants nearby, also the center is close and can easily be reached. For any questions please feel free to reach out.

name: Townhouse in Rotterdam · ★5.0 · 2 bedrooms · 5 beds · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview:
Prins Alexander is a family friendly residential area in the east of Rotterdam, between the Kralingse Bos wooded park and the Zevenhuizerplas lake and its many recreational opportunities.

Convenient: from the Prins-Alexander station, you can easily catch a train to Utrecht or get the metro to Rotterdam City Centre.

• Pietje Bell adventure playground: the ultimate outdoor play area in Prinsenland, with ponds and playground equipment.
• Nesselande beach: an expansive sandy beach stretching 800 metres along the Zevenhuizerplas.
• Alexandrium Shopping Centre: 140 shops focusing on fashion and interior decoration.
• Kralingse Bos park is popular with joggers and inline skaters. On and around the lake, you can sail, swim, or just relax in the sun beside your barbecue.
host_about: I am parttime trainer nonviolent communication, daddy, sailor.

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★5.0 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 1 bath

neighborhood_overview:
Rotterdam’s passion for work and dynamic energy are unleashed to their fullest here. This area is all about working hard and playing even harder. The area used to see a constant flow of passenger ships arriving and departing. Lloydkwartier has been transformed into a modern area where people live and work, with a strong focus on the creative sector. The historic warehouses, old port monuments and modern buildings house a wide range of design agencies, advertising firms, architects, photographers and audiovisual companies. Interested in meeting these creative spirits? Grab a cup of coffee at Stroom, a former power plant that has been transformed into a hotel and restaurant. This is where the local creative entrepreneurs have their appointments and source their daily shot of high-octane caffeine.

People from ‘beyond the islands’ also enjoy visiting the Lloydpier and Müllerpier, taking a stroll along the riverbanks, checking out the ships, and feeling the wind through their ha

name: Home in Rotterdam · ★4.93 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview:
Historical neighbourhood, built mainly in the 1930’s, with beautiful nature on walking distance. There are several supermarkets, bars and restaurants nearby and playgrounds for the little ones. You can also find one of Rotterdams most authentic multicultural shopping streets with local stores and restaurants at 15 minutes walking distance.

Public transport is also easy to find, which brings you quickly to the city center.

There’s paid parking in the streets but there is free parking on a ten minute walking distance.
host_about:
We are a married couple with one child and moved to this house a few years ago. We renovated it all by ourselves and really enjoy living in it. We are born and raised in Rotterdam and love this city! It's people are very open, mixed and direct. A great combination :)

We like to share the experience of our house and city with you!

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★5.0 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview: This apartment is located in one of the best areas of Rotterdam; Blijdorp. It's an urban and modern neighbourhood in the north of Rotterdam. Many young families and starters are situated here. It's super close to basically everything; 1 min walking distance from a supermarket & Blijdorp metro station. Within 5 min walking distance, you can find many other hotspots, such as 'Het Vroesenpark' - a large city park, several coffee places and more. One of Rotterdam's most visited tourist's spots is the Blijdorp Zoo, which is also very close. Furthermore, you are super close to the city centre: 1 metro stop to Central Station (2 min), 8/10 min bike ride or 20 min by foot.
host_about:
Who am I? I am 29 years old, I live in Rotterdam together with my boyfriend and I work for myself as a sustainability consultant and yoga instructor. 

I LOVE to travel, I LOVE the sun & I LOVE animals (especially dogs). I think this is basically the three things I love the most ;) (Besides my boyfriend, family & friends of course). 

I like doing yoga and living in the moment. I love nature and being surrounded by people who enjoy life and simply smile at whatever comes their way. 

Food: Italian & Indian
Travel (tops): New Zealand, Australia, Vietnam,  Sri Lanka, USA. 
Books: The power of Now 
Music: everything :)

Welcome to Hoogvliet!
Your room is located in the quiet Hoogvliet, a neighborhood in Rotterdam South. 2 metro stations are 8 minutes' walk away. From these stations the subways transport you to Rotterdam-Zuid and Rotterdam-Centrum in 15-20 minutes. There are coffee houses, places to go out, restaurants and cafes and bars.

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★5.0 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1.5 shared baths
neighborhood_overview:
We live in a lively and multi-ethnic neighbourhood that feels a little bit like a small, international village within Rotterdam. You have literally everything around the corner from a bakery to supermarkets, a flower shop and many restaurants.
Our favourite cafe is Wolf on Wolphaertsbocht with great breakfast and cakes.
A small hidden secret is Koffie Ambacht with its lovely people and music or art performances.
The big shopping mall at Zuid Plein is a 15 min walk. There is also the new theater with a lovely big terras and nice other restaurants where you can enjoy the sun till late in the evening. (Lisa is our favourite)
You can see the top of the trees from Zuider Park (the largest park in Rotterdam) form our living room window, or can walk to Ahoy or the water front.
Katendrecht and Wilhelminapier with its iconic buildings is only 2,5 km away.
The city center is 15 min by public transport.
The historical bicyle tunnel is open again after constr

With my husband I live in Rotterdam in a beautiful old townhouse. We love Rotterdam for the diversity and liveliness. It has a multicultural population (170 nationalities), great places, interesting artistic and cultural events. 
I do graphic designs, dance with elderly people with dementia and work in a hospice as creative therapist. 
We are open minded friendly people, like to meet people and share our house with them. We love to show the special places in our fantastic city. Make people feel happy is what we like to do.

name: Loft in Rotterdam · ★5.0 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview:
The house is located on the quay of the Maas river in the historical Delfshaven district. Only 20 minutes from Central Station. There are many good and cozy restaurants in this neighborhood. Within walking distance is the old marina. In the old canal houses you can now find antique and curio shops, small distilleries, restaurants and some craft beer breweries.

Because this house is close to several tram stops and a metro stop, the rest of the city is well connected by public transport. You can be at the Museumpark in 10 minutes, at the Maritime museum in 15 minutes and at the boarding point for the boat trips in about 20 minutes.

The "Nieuwe Binnenweg", known for its many nice boutique shops, is only 10 minutes by metro and the Witte de With, the entertainment street with lively bars and many restaurants, is only 12 minutes away.
host_about: I m 64 yr man from Amsterdam, work in the national theatre and arts Executive director

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.88 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview: Rotterdam Alexander is a quiet neighbourhood, with excellent public transportation to the city center and the highway A16 and A20.
host_about:
Ik Stefanie (Nederlanse, getrouwd, momenteel 57 jaar) reis meestal samen met één van mijn dochters Samantha en Brigitte (28 en 31 jaar), aangezien mijn man niet zo van culturele reizen houdt. Ik geef de voorkeur aan een betaalbare accommodatie ter plaatse boven een hotel, vanwege de huiselijke sfeer en de mogelijkheid om eventueel andere mensen te leren kennen. Ik ben geen veeleisende bewoner en zal goed met uw spullen omgaan. 

Mijn stijl van reizen is low budget, ik maak graag gebruik van hostels en dergelijke, kamperen is echter niet mijn stijl. Ik kom graag in contact met plaatselijke bewoners om te horen hoe zij hun leven ervaren en hun mening te horen over deze wereld.

In het verleden heb ik op diverse reizen naar Zuid-Afrika ook vrijwilligerswerk gedaan (samen met één van mijn dochters) in de townships van Port Elizabeth. Ik vind het belangrijk om te proberen mijn steentje bij te dragen in de leefbaarheid voor andere mensen op onze aarde 

Mijn hobby's zijn lezen, handwerken, reizen met mijn kinderen en mijn werk op de klantenservice van een energiebedrijf. 

I am Stefanie ( Netherlandish , married , currently 54 years) usually travel with one of my daughters Samantha and Brigitte (25 and 28) , as my husband does not like cultural tours . I prefer an affordable accommodation spot above a hotel, because of the homey atmosphere and the opportunity to get to know any other people. I'm not a demanding occupant and will properly handle your belongings.

My style of travel is low budget , I like to use hostels and such , camping is not my style. I like to come in contact with local residents to hear how they experience their lives and hear their views on the world.

In the past I have also volunteered on several trips to South Africa (along with one of my daughters) in the townships of Port Elizabeth. I think it's important to try to do my part in the quality of life for other people on earth

My hobbies are reading , crafts, traveling with my children and my work on the customer service of an energy company.

neighborhood_overview: My loft is situated in Rotterdam Delfshaven, which is in the western part of town, very close to the city center. Delfshaven is a very multicultural part of Rotterdam, the pier where I live is known for its port activities. Usually, there are one or more commercial boats moored close by. Depending on the season, one or more cruiseships sail by every week on their way to either the city center or back towards the North Sea and often people drive up here just to see them sail by.
host_about:
Hi!
My name is Jolie. I'm a clinical psychologist who moved to Rotterdam 8 years ago. I'm the first owner of my loft and have designed the interior myself with great care. I enjoy living here very much. After some nice experiences with Airbnb as a guest, I decided it would be selfish to keep my spare bedroom all to myself, especially since it has such a great view of the Rotterdam skyline. I look forward to meeting you!

Enjoy a nice stroll on the Coolsingel, past City Hall and the Bijenkorf (department store) towards the Koopgoot shopping mall (as locals call it) & further along the Maas. Visit the Lijnbaan, a pedestrian shopping street, which has a  variety of shops. Visit Museum Rotterdam which exhibits the rich history of Rotterdam. 500 meters from our apartment starts The Meent which has great cafe's, bars and restaurants.

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.88 · 1 bedroom · 3 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview:
The Scheepvaartkwartier is a protected cityscape. Stately mansions on classic avenues bring the rich shipping history of Rotterdam to life. A romantic location for couples, who like to be immortalized by a photograph against a picturesque backdrop. Anyone who feels like a glass of wine and a tasty dinner can go to atmospheric restaurants such as Loos, Zinc or Louise Petit. The amazing Bar Berta is just next door, where you can have the best tapas outside Spain!

You’re steps away from many of the Rotterdam highlights like the Euromast Park, the Maas River, historical Veerhaven, Erasmusbrug, Markthal and cultural destinations like the Kunsthal Museum.

The Park is a popular place to relax and picnic in the summer. Moreover, all kinds of festivals and events take place. The park is home to the Euromast, the highest observation tower in the Netherlands. A restaurant with a panoramic view of the city and harbor is located at an altitude of 100 meters.
host_about: I love meeting people, music, travelling and my home town Rotterdam. I'm an Airbnb fan from day one! Next to being an Airbnb host myself I love using it while travelling. I'm very relaxed and super-positive!

name: Condo in Rotterdam · ★4.67 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview: Charlois, a number of artists’ initiatives and artists working in Oud-Charlois  open their doors often for the guests of Art Rotterdam. The last ten years Charlois has developed into a lively quarter for contemporary art and culture. In  this street lives a number of artist.

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.90 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 1.5 baths

neighborhood_overview:
Penthouse Prison is located on Eendrachtsplein (Union Square) It is located in the very heart of Rotterdam with the North-South axis connecting Centraal Station with the Art area (o.a. Museum Boymans and Kunsthal) to the South and connecting the Lijnban shopping area with the up-and coming Oude Westen area.
The hustle and bustle nightlife in the Witte de Witstraat and the serenity of The Park are within a ten minute walk.
YOU WILL NOT FIND A LOCATION MORE CENTRAL.
host_about: We are part of Heilige Boontjes, a social project to give Youngsters In Rotterdam a second chance.

neighborhood_overview: De buurt is een rustige buurt. Het appartement is makkelijk te bereiken vanaf het centraal station. Op 400 meter afstand lopen is er een supermarkt en tram halte.

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.83 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 1 bath

neighborhood_overview: The loft is located in a residential building and therefore quiet hours need to be respected between 22.00-07.00. Smoking is NOT allowed. There is no balcony or a terrace.
host_about:
I'm a friendly, creative & entrepreneurial Dutch Caribbean individual. I  just love the feeling of putting a smile on someone’s face and brighten their day. 

I live in Rotterdam. With a special love for coffee, live music, design, architecture, NYC, Rotterdam, StandUp Paddling, riding my fixie & great company of family and friends.

name: Townhouse in Rotterdam · ★5.0 · 2 bedrooms · 6 beds · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview: Hippe buurt met veel vintage restaurantjes en hippe winkeltjes! Het Oude Noorden is helemaal in opkomst en ligt op loopafstand van het centrum van Rotterdam ( 10 minuten lopen).

name: Townhouse in Rotterdam · ★4.69 · 4 bedrooms · 5 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview:
The house is 2 km from city center and bus number 32 (every 10 mins) will drop you there. Main tourist attraction like Markthal, Cube houses, City center, Erasmus bridge, Willems bridge are all under 2.5km radius from the house.

The new hip and happening locality of Katendrecht and Kop van Zuid (Head of the South) is 5 mins walking distance from our house. Over the past few years, this peninsula has become one of the liveliest parts of town and a dream destination for foodies and is lined in cosy restaurants, lunchrooms and cafés.Its a place where the locals like to hangout and not many tourist are aware of it.

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★5.0 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview:
The neighbourhood ' Het oude Noorden' is a charming place where a variety of cultures meet in traditional as well as hip restaurants, terraces, smal cafes, pubs, squares etc.
One of the most symphatic festivals: the Blue grass festival (June) is beiing located at the square close to the house and attracts people from all over the world.

name: Boutique hotel in Rotterdam · ★4.86 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 private bath
neighborhood_overview: We offer views of the rivier, harbour and city.
host_about: Two former journalists who started their own town house hotel in Rotterdam.

name: Home in Rotterdam · ★4.26 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 shared bath
neighborhood_overview: It's nearby located to Ahoy and Maassilo (night club) and about 15 -20 min away from downtown with the metro or tram. Rotterdam is ideally located if you want to visit Den Haag or Amsterdam. There is a metro that takes you directly to Den Haag Central. From the house to Amsterdam Central takes you about an hour.

name: Home in Hoogvliet Rotterdam · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.88 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview:
Deze buurt, Blijdorp, uit 1930 is een van de gezelligste maar ook rustigste wijken van Rotterdam, met veel groen. Met het Vroesenpark en leuke eettentjes en koffiezaakjes om de hoek. Daarnaast goed bereikbaar per openbaar vervoer met een metrohalte naast de deur.

Wil je liever lopen dan is Centraal Station slecht 10-15 minuten lopen. De binnenstad een paar minuten langer.

name: Home in Rotterdam · ★4.92 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview: The shops of the West Kruiskade, coffee bars of the Binnenweg and the center are within walking distance (10 minutes).  In the neighborhood is 'Kino', a cozy small cinema where you can also enjoy delicious food and drinks.  The Kop van Zuid, the Kunsthal, the Maritime Museum: you can get there in no time with an OV bicycle!
host_about: Reislustig en een echte Rotterdammer!

name: Boat in Rotterdam · ★4.67 · 2 bedrooms · 3 beds · 1 private bath
neighborhood_overview: The Maritime District is the historic city centre of Rotterdam and is a great place to stay as it's relatively quiet but has >200 bars, restaurants & musea in a range of 300 meters.

Condo in Rotterdam · ★5.0 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview:
Blijdorp is a lush green laidback residential neighborhood directly next to the Central Station and city centre.

In our street you find Vroesenpark with the relaxed Parkpavillion for food and drinks in the sun. The park is great for jogging and has outdoor fitness facilities.

A short walk along the romatic Singel waterway you get to the entrance of Blijdorp Zoo.

Around the corner you can have breakfast at Sajoer juice bar or grab a beer at Statencafé.
host_about: We are Emilie and Kris, two architects, with daughter Roos. We're fond of veggies and fruits from our allotment garden, our oldtimer Mercedes, sailing. We love to receive you in our self-renovated house.

Most beautiful area in Rotterdam

We enjoy, everyday again, the urban live and the dynamics of our typical harbour city. We love adventurous travels,  and we are always eager to meet new people from all over the world.

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.33 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview: Only 13 minutes away from Ahoy by metro. Central station is one stop away. The city center is 5 minutes away by metro.

name: Townhouse in Hoek van Holland · ★4.82 · 3 bedrooms · 4 beds · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview:
This area is a hidden gem and I hope you enjoy it as much as we do.

There are various beach cafes/clubs and restaurants to choose from within 15 min walk whether you need space for your kids to run around and play on swingsets or a quiet corner for a date, or you want to spend the afternoon in a cabana.

There is also a gorgeous restaurant [with great terraces] on our street called Viersprong which is a 2 minute walk.

Bike & Running Trails - 1 min
Bus stop - 1 min
Grocery stores - 3 min drive
Train Station - 4 min drive
Harbour - 4 min drive
Beach - 5 min on bike to closest beach/15 min walk/3 min drive

Walk to:
Hoek Van Holland Rechtestraat Entrance :15 min
Hoek Van Holland Main Beach: 30min
Vluchtenberg Beach: 20min

Drive to:
Hoek Van Holland Rechtestraat Entrance (if you drive, and want to be close as possible to the beach, come here): 3 min drive
Hoek Van Holland Center
host_about:
Hey Everyone, 

I am so excited to be a part of the AirBNB community. Im Canadian and spent 10 years living and working in Vancouver, Canada as an investigator and have recently relocated to the Netherlands.

My background is in law enforcement and I currently work in football (soccer). During my time in North America, and occasionally in Europe, I work in film and TV.

I live a very and active healthy lifestyle and also train Brazilian Jiu Jitsu, CrossFit and travel frequently to study and train. 

I use AIRBNB a lot to travel with my boyfriend Ronald as well as he moves around a lot between Europe, North America and Australia in the horticultural industry for long durations.

I am a very easy going, happy person who is respectful, enthusiastic, friendly and polite and promise to make your visit as enjoyable as possible and/or to treat your homes with the utmost care.

I am always looking forward to using airbnb to travel and host to experience new cultures, meet new people and see the world.

name: Townhouse in Rotterdam · ★4.81 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 private bath
host_about: Real happiness lies in making others happy!

name: Condo in Rotterdam · ★4.89 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
Townhouse in Rotterdam · ★4.90 · 2 bedrooms · 3 beds · 2 baths
neighborhood_overview: Het huis ligt in het Nieuwe Westen van Rotterdam met mooie parken en speeltuinen, met diverse leuke cafés/restaurant op loopafstand. Daarnaast is centrum van Rotterdam binnen 5 minuten te bereiken

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.82 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview: The Vroesenpark is a beautifull parc in Rotterdam where you can buy a take away coffee and walk around. Also visit the ‘Kralingse Plas’ a lake and forest in the neighbourhood, 10min by bike. Also a super market is a 5 min walk.

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★5.0 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview:
Ons plekje is uniek in Rotterdam! Omringd door water met veel groen (en heel veel leuke watervogels). Elke dag komen er wel een aantal vogels gezellig buurten! Vooral de grote zwanen zijn zeer imposant! En er is rust! Je hebt niet het gevoel zo dicht bij het centrum van Rotterdam te zijn.

De Kralingse plas ligt op 5 minuten fiets afstand en als je een minuutje verder fietst, zit je in het centrum van Kralingen met zijn gezellige barretjes een eettentjes.

Fiets je de andere kant op, dan ben je in 20 minuutjes (inclusief het pondje) in Kinderdijk, met al zijn mooie molens!

En het blijft een fijn idee dat je met bus, tram en metro (die laatste bevind zich op een minuutje fiets afstand) zo in het bruisende hart van Rotterdam bent!!

name: Home in Rotterdam · ★5.0 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview: The house is located in the south of Rotterdam. It is within walking distance of the river, where you will find the entrance of the Maastunnel and other transportation options to get to the city. One fun experience is to take the watertaxi from here.
host_about:
Hello!
My name is Ate, I'm 27 years old and living in Rotterdam. I would like to welcome you in this cosy place within this amazing city. Enjoy your stay!

name: Guest suite in Rotterdam · ★4.80 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview:
Situated only 10 min. from Rotterdam city center in the old and lush green part of Rotterdam. With an architectual national monument (Bergpolderflat) right on the doorstep! The neighbourhood has some cozy restaurants, shops and parks to explore.

You're in the center within moments. Here you can visit 'the Markthal', 'Cube houses', 'Witte de Withstraat' and many museums or architectural highlights. If you cycle the other way, to 'Kralingen' you will find the ever and green 'Kralingse Bos' where you can take a soothing walk or rent a boat for the day to explore Rotterdam by water.

neighborhood_overview: Terbregge is a wonderful family neighborhood with a snack bar and lovely restaurant.  Also includes a community center with a children's playground. Enjoy a bike ride along the river and jump in for a swim. Lovely walks to a nearby park with a pancake house and lake. Where you can feed the ducks or rent a paddle boat.

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.22 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview: Situated only 4 min from Rotterdam city center in a green and quiet apartment block!
host_about:
This is my profile! As a host I feel it's my duty to make you feel at home during your stay. I like to improve my accommodation based on reviews from actual guests and have made many (small) improvements overtime to increase the overall guest experience. 

Personally I travel quite often around the world and get a lot of inspiration from other people's accommodations as well. I believe that with our ideas combined together, we can create a picture-perfect 5 star accommodation. Welcome to your (temporary) home where we will be at your service 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.

name: Hotel in Rotterdam · ★5.0 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 private bath
neighborhood_overview: Rotterdam is the ultimate place for a global nomad to feel at home with its melting pot of different cultures. Want to live like a local? Easy. Grab a Supernova bike and explore the hustle and bustle of the neighbourhood. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Het Nieuwe Instituut, Chabot Museum and Sonneveld House. The nearest airport is Rotterdam The Hague Airport, 8 km from Supernova Hotel. You have great places to have breakfast, lunch or dinner just within 800 meter of the hotel. For local tips follow us on Instagram.

name: Condo in Rotterdam · ★5.0 · 3 bedrooms · 3 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview:
The neighborhood is one of Rotterdam’s greenest and quietest. However, it is lined with cute pubs and hip coffee places. Also, you are never far away from downtown, where there is an abundance of food, drink and art culture.

Right from the doorstep is a boulevard which can be followed for miles. To the city center, or away from it to the park.
host_about:
Hi! I am a Dutch airline pilot with knack for traveling. I’m probably booking last-minute, because when on holiday I don’t plan ahead most of the times! Most often I travel together with Lotte, my girlfriend of 7 years. We live in Rotterdam.

Love music, reading, hiking, living with intent.

We have decided it would be fun to live in a different city for a few months, and therefore we rent out our apartment to reduce our own costs of staying somewhere. There are no reviews of the apartment itself as of yet, but I have been rated highly while travelling, and mean to perpetuate this while renting out. 

If you look at the map and the pictures you can see it’s a superb apartment. We are looking forward to meeting you.

host_about: Hi there! I'm a creative, curious and open-minded girl living and working in Rotterdam. I love traveling, writing, photography, art and coffee. About the latter I write daily as an editor. Hope I can offer you a nice stay in Rotterdam!

name: Boat in Rotterdam · ★4.67 · 5 bedrooms · 5 beds · 3 baths
neighborhood_overview: The Maritime District has it all, it's very centrally located and has all the highraise buildings and most of musea, bars & restaurants in walking distance.

name: Loft in Rotterdam · ★5.0 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview:
Witte de Withstraat also called White Street is without a doubt the coolest most vibrant street of Rotterdam. This street is also home to the very famous bar ‘De Witte Aap’, voted ‘Best Bar in the World’ by Lonely Planet.

Never a Dull Moment
With rows & rows of only proper good food, bars, clubs, wall arts & quirky shops igniting your senses, one should only fall in love with feeling so alive here. The true city vibe beats on this street, so if you're looking to stay right at the heart of Rotterdam, this is the place to be.

name: Boat in Rotterdam · 4 bedrooms · 8 beds · 4 baths
neighborhood_overview: Rooms on Water ligt in het centrum van Rotterdam, in het Maritime District. Het is doorgaans een vrij rustige buurt. De Markthal, Oude Haven, markt, winkelstraten, musea en uitgaansstraten liggen allemaal heel vlakbij op loopafstand.
host_about:
Ik heb in 2017 het ruim van dit voormalig vrachtschip verbouwd tot luxe accommodatie. Ik verheug me erop u aan boord en in Rotterdam te verwelkomen. 

Voordat ik dit bedrijf begon heb ik jarenlang met mijn man op een tweemastklipper gezeild met gasten, runden we op dit schip (wat nu Rooms on Water is) een winkel en werkplaats waarin we traditionele schepen restaureerden en was ik schipper op een watertaxi.

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.94 · 2 bedrooms · 6 beds · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview:
Rotterdam has lots to offer: for children, young people or elderly people, in or on the water, high in the air (Euromast) or inside when it is more suitable.

In Rotterdam you will never get bored exploring the city and it's surroundings.
Rotterdam is a must-see city with lots of attractions, museums, monuments and architectural highlights to look out for.
For kids, attractions at or on the water, city or port tours for every age and interest.
Cultural highlights just a few minutes walk:
- Maritiem Museum
- Wereld Museum
- Kunsthal
- Dutch Photo Museum
- National Historic Museum
- Galleries
- Cinema

The big shopping area is just next door and you are surrounded by the finest bars and restaurants.

Hi!
Ik ben Mario en eigenaar van het schip te samen met mijn vrouw Eelke.
Wij exploiteren het schip zowel stilliggend voor de wal als varend.
Wij wonen ook aan boord met onze hond, maar hebben ons privé verblijf.

neighborhood_overview:
Within walking distance to Rotterdam Centraal Station and just a short drive from Rotterdam The Hague Airport (RTM) you are located in the vibrant area of Rotterdam North.

Set along the banks of the Nieuwe Maas River, Rotterdam is Europe’s biggest port and offers diverse dining, shopping, and entertainment options. Explore the charming streets of this once-medieval city and be sure to visit modern landmarks like the soaring Euromast observation tower, Erasmus Bridge, and The Markthal.

Within walking distance to Rotterdam Centraal Station and just a short drive from Rotterdam The Hague Airport (RTM) you are located in the vibrant area of Rotterdam North.

Set along the banks of the Nieuwe Maas River, Rotterdam is Europe’s biggest port and offers diverse dining, shopping, and entertainment options. Explore the charming streets of this once-medieval city and be sure to visit modern landmarks like the soaring Euromast observation tower, Erasmus Bridge, and The Markthal.

name: Townhouse in Rotterdam · ★5.0 · 4 bedrooms · 6 beds · 1 bath
Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.85 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview:
Utterly bursting with life, and outside the usual tourist trail, the street and immediate neighbourhood has an addictive atmosphere. A One-of-a-kind fusion of Asian street culture, European indulgences, and Middle Eastern food-market energy.

In 1 minute you can be relaxing on the bank of one of the widest and most magical canals in Rotterdam, the “Heemradsingel”. Wake up to the smells of the Bakery next door, and within a 30 second walk in either direction of the front door you have brunch and coffee hotspots, wood-fire Pizza, a truly unique fine-dining experience, and a beautiful open grassed ’square’ where the locals hang out on the grass as they soak up the vibe.

name: Loft in Rotterdam · ★4.91 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1.5 shared baths
host_about:
Dear reader, 

Thank you for reading this before you made a booking request. Airbnb has changed a lot since they started, they became a lot bigger with an estimated 2,6 billion in revenue this year.

I am an apartment owner that has put love and attention into my place so it is a nice place to live in. I am sharing that experience with like minded strangers. The motivational factor is ofcourse the money but in the end this should hopefully not be a merely financial transaction. Please keep in mind that if you make a request for booking that I am offering a friendly hospitable experience in my house and not a stay in a hotel ;) Thank you

name: Home in Rotterdam · ★5.0 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview:
Located in a quite area in Kralingen-Crooswijk, next to the city centre of Rotterdam within walking distance. You can visit cafe's, restaurants, shops and a brewery in the immediate vicinity at the Zwaanshals, or walk into the other direction to the Kralingse Bos, a lake with a beautifull forest around it.

Like to sport? Go to Schuttersveld around the corner to have free acces to the tennis court, outdoor fitness equipment and running track, or take a run around the lake of Kralingse Bos.
host_about:
We, Stef and Jeen, are a couple living in the beautiful city Rotterdam. We are both born and raised in the area so we are happy to tell you more about all the great places to visit.

We used to work in the hospitality branche for many years and we love to travel.  In the past we used Airbnb the to stay at somebody’s home, but now it’s time to be your host.

Please feel free to contact us if you have any questions. 

Hope to see you soon!

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.99 · 2 bedrooms · 3 beds · 1.5 baths
Townhouse in Rotterdam · ★5.0 · 4 bedrooms · 3 beds · 2 baths
neighborhood_overview:
Blijdorp is a vibrant and green neighborhood located in the north of Rotterdam, known for its beautiful zoo, historic architecture, and various amenities. The neighborhood is known for its child-friendly environment with several parks, playgrounds, and schools in the vicinity.

The location of Blijdorp is ideal for both tourists and local residents. The city center of Rotterdam, with its bustling shops, restaurants, and nightlife, is easily accessible within a short distance. Rotterdam Central Station, a major hub for train, tram, and metro transportation, is also easily accessible from Blijdorp.

Blijdorp boasts a diversity of architecture, with beautiful historic buildings, modern apartment complexes, and charming streets. The neighborhood offers an attractive mix of residential, commercial, and recreational spaces, with various shops, restaurants, and cafes in the vicinity.

For nature lovers, Blijdorp is an ideal place, with the renowned Diergaarde Bli

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1.5 baths
Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.94 · 1 bedroom · 1 shared bath
Condo in Rotterdam · ★4.97 · Studio · 2 beds · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview: Als bewoner van het Van Vollenhovenkwartier geniet je iedere dag van de grandeur van de monumentale wijk Het Scheepvaartkwartier. Het Scheepvaartkwartier, ook wel Nieuwe Werk genoemd, is een karakteristieke en veelzijdige buurt. De maritieme sfeer, de indrukwekkende historische bebouwing en het vele groen maken de buurt tot een aantrekkelijk stuk Rotterdam. Het leuke van de ligging is dat het omgeven is door de klassieke allure en uitstraling van het Scheepvaartkwartier terwijl het bruisende stadscentrum makkelijk te bereiken is. Of het nu gaat om de Markthal, het Museumkwartier, Rotterdam Centraal, de Nieuwe Maas of de Wilhelminapier. Alle hotspots zijn dichtbij. Haltes voor tram, bus, watertaxi en het metro zijn op loopafstand te bereiken. In de wijk vind je horeca waaronder toprestaurants, delicatessen, een AH, musea, kan je borrelen in de prachtige historische Veerhaven of ontspannen in het Park. Sfeervol, uniek en historisch wonen op een van de beste stadslocaties van Nederland me
host_about: As a resident of the Van Vollenhovenkwartier, you can enjoy the grandeur of the monumental Het Scheepvaartkwartier district every day. A neighborhood known for its nearly 100 national monuments and as one of the richest neighborhoods in the Netherlands. In a few steps from your home you will find top restaurants and museums, you can have a drink in the beautiful historic Veerhaven or relax with friends in the Park. The other Rotterdam pearls are also at your feet. Whether it concerns the Markthal, Museum Quarter, Rotterdam Central or the Wilhelminapier. All hotspots are close by and also easy to reach by public transport and water taxi. Furthermore, the district is car-free and there is no through traffic.

name: Condo in Rotterdam · ★5.0 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview: De Esch is a neighbourhood on the outside of the city center. It is peacefull en serene. De advantage is that you don't have the noise of the city center. It's mostly modern appartmentbuildings. The people who live in it are primarely working appartmentowners and students from Erasmus Univesity. There are nice walking routes down the riverside and there is a beautifulll park which will make you relax after a day of work or study.
host_about: I'm a passionate kitesurfer. I work at a vocational school in Rotterdam. I love my homecity and when there's wind you can find me on the beaches of Zeeland and Hoek van Holland.

name: Condo in Rotterdam · ★5.0 · 3 bedrooms · 2 beds · 1.5 baths
Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.92 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview:
Het is een rustige oude wijk in Rotterdam Zuid. Een parel en oase in een drukke stad. Je bent binnen no-time in de stad per fiets, ov of auto.

Verder is het een karakteristieke wijk die een oude dorpskern en dorpskerk heeft. Smalle straten en klinkers in Charlois, zijn een schril contrast met de nieuw- en hoogbouw van de stad.

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.96 · 1 bedroom · 4 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview:
Located in multicultural Delfshaven, few minutes walk to the metro station, the historical Delfshaven neighbourhood and immediate vicinity of public transport that can take you anywhere in the city, various shops, nice restaurants and recreational places. At walking distance there is Van Nelle Fabriek (UNESCO World Heritage Site), Euromastpark, Erasmus Medical Centre, museums and many many more.
Great Food Market at the Visserijplein - 2 times a week (Thurs & Sat) - with vendors for fruit, vegetables, cheese, meat, clothing, shoes & housewares.

If you have any particular interests, just ask, I might have some tips ;)
host_about:
I'm a performing artist based in Rotterdam City. 
My work takes me all over the globe, so travelling is a familiar state of mind.
I enjoy simplicity, good food, quality music and fun conversations :)

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.89 · 2 bedrooms · 1 bed · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is based in the hart of the city on the Noordereiland, an island that lies between the Meuse, right between the three iconic Rotterdam bridges. From the window you can see the river and the big white bridge (Erasmus bridge).

The neighbourhood is a very laid back place in a city that is vibrant and urban, with very nice people (so are my neighbours :). There is little car traffic as people hardly pass the island itself to get somewhere. There is a small Spar supermarket, two coffee and lunchrooms, a pop-up restaurant and several kids playgrounds in the middle of the island.
host_about:
My name is Sabine. I am an entrepreneurial anthropologist, living & working in Rotterdam.  I started my own company in 2015: BlueCity: based in a former swimmingpool in Rotterdam (Tropicana). Its core business involves sustainability and showing what we can do with waste :-)...
And my little son Jan and I have created our own paradise in the city! 

My interests are social entrepreneurship, social innovation, surfing, circle economy, systemic thinking, more, more and ever more sports and (online) large scale interventions & sustainability.

The world is my number one country :-!  But aside from all that, I love to learn! About you, about the world and about your world!
So hope to meet you soon :-)!

name: Home in Rotterdam · ★4.75 · 3 bedrooms · 2 beds · 1.5 baths
Townhouse in Rotterdam · ★5.0 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview: Our house looks out over a small park with water. Big enough to take a walk and enjoy the ducks and geese
host_about: Hallo, ik ben Peter Zeegers. 60 j oud en getrouwd. 3 dochters en 3 kleinkinderen. Ik vind het leuk om interessante mensen te ontmoeten. Leven en laten leven vind ik belangrijk. Als iemand maar gelukkig is met zijn levensstijl

name: Loft in Rotterdam · ★4.65 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview: When you step out the door, you are right in the center of Rotterdam. Nice coffee corners, lunchrooms, restaurants, shops and sights and the well-known Hofplein are right around the corner. The central station is located 150 meters from the accommodation. You can also visit the Markthal within 15 minutes walking distance for some delicious food.
host_about:
We are Natasja and Mylan -  a couple who live in Amsterdam and own several small businesses in the direct area and in Rotterdam.  

We started in 2012 with our B&B -Charming Apartment with Canal View!  In august 2015 we opened a small pension Hotel Midtown Amsterdam. In May 2021 our brend new accomodation in Rotterdam opend. Now we have 4 studio/apartments in Amsterdam and 4 studio/apartements in Rotterdam. We would love to welcome you in both city's! 

We enjoy living in Amsterdam, just 5 minutes from the hotel in Amsterdam. 

Our goal is to offer comfort, good mattresses, privacy, a clean apartment and a good location to access all the main attractions of Amsterdam/Rotterdam culture.

We would like to welcome you and hope to offer more accomodations in the Netherlands in the future.

host_about: Dutch guy who loves to travel and exploring the world.

name: Townhouse in Rotterdam · ★4.88 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview: Within 250 meters there’s a huge variety of things that you want nearby: shops, breakfast places, restaurants, cafes, a night shop, the Emergency Room of the Erasmus University Hospital the Depot of the Boijmans Museum and stops of the main lines of the metro, trams and buses. There are four supermarkets and the best vinyl record shops of Europe within 700 meters.
host_about: We love to travel and have done so through over 80 countries mainly over land. In Rotterdam we have a company in the hospitality industry called City Safari in which we invite people to visit the superdiverse Rotterdamers in their homes, houses of worship or civic initiatives. This way we help organizations build their diversity program by actually meeting the people who make up the city in person and we invite individuals to explore the city by meeting these people and going places outside the city center.

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.75 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
Condo in Rotterdam · ★4.44 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
Townhouse in Rotterdam · ★4.60 · 4 bedrooms · 1 bed · 1.5 baths
host_about: I live with River, my son. He has autism, and we are approaching this in a very relaxed and untraditional way.  He is unschooled. I am a writer and a newspaper journalist/columnist. We have an international family and travel a lot. We do airbnb of our groundfloor appartment of our 3 story townhouse to make some extra income and also to donate to our foundation, Incluzivo, aimed at developing creative projects for kids with and without autism.

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.94 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview: The city center is special for its experimental architecture, street life and great food. Walking distance from major train and metro stations, near landmarks (Markthal, Kubus houses and waterfront) and famous neighbourhoods. Main shopping and restaurant areas are just a stone-throw away, but the immediate surrounding is tranquil. Arrive by train or car (p+r easily accessible by metro) and make use of the newly renovated pedestrian public spaces or rent a bike. Also a good starting point for day trips to The Hague, Delft or Amsterdam.

neighborhood_overview:
The house is situated in Hillegersberg, a nice and quiet neighbourhood nearby Rotterdam. So especially in the evenings there can't be a lot of noise.
In Hillegersberg there is a small and cosy centre with soms shops and restaurants. The supermarket is also nearby.
In front of the house is a river, which is going to several lakes.
There are also some possibility's to rent a boat.
The centre of rotterdam is 15 minutes drive and the beaches from Den Haag/ Scheveningen till Hoek van Holland are 30/45 minutes drive.
host_about:

I am working as an interieur architect.

name: Earthen home in Hoek van Holland · ★5.0 · 2 bedrooms · 1 bed · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview: The town of Hoek van Holland originates from digging the Nieuwe Waterweg in 1872. In the following century, thousands of defenses were built on both banks to defend this new channel. These influences have been decisive in shaping the landscape of ‘the Hook of Holland’. Even today, the Hook is continuously subject to the influence of Rotterdam and the North Sea. If you pay close attention, you will notice this everywhere. A highlight is taking a walk along the Noorderpier or the Zandmotor at Ter heide.
host_about: Originally from Hoek van Holland and co-founder of the Cocondo concept. For the pilotbunker I will be your (online) host if you need any assistance!

name: Condo in Rotterdam · ★4.67 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview:
Het Nieuwe Westen has a special mix of living with metropolitan allure and typical pre-war buildings. The neighborhood is a real city district with beautiful canals, interesting shopping streets and spacious squares. This makes the Nieuwe Westen district diverse and very enjoyable! The Nieuwe Binnenweg and 1e Middelandstraat/Kruiskade are important streets that lead directly to the city center.

Several supermarkets, convenience stores, restaurants and cafes are located in the immediate vicinity. Need greenery or water? Take a walk along the Heemraadsingel or visit the Euromastpark or the Vroesenpark. For children there are several playgrounds in the Heemraadspark and you can reach Blijdorp Zoo in no time.
host_about:
Fun easy going person who loves to travel whenever possible. Like to eat out and try out new food. Experience the local culture and meeting new people.  Really into sports and adventures.

Most of the time I travel with my travel buddy who is my dear girlfriend :-)

neighborhood_overview:
Doordat het appartement centraal gelegen is aan het Oostplein in Rotterdam is alles binnen loopafstand. Loop bijvoorbeeld binnen 5 minuten naar de historische Oude Haven of de kubuswoningen en de markthal.

Daarnaast is het appartement op 2 min loopafstand gelegen aan de maas waardoor u een prachtige wandeling kunt maken onder zowel de Willemsbrug en Erasmusburg wat u een uniek uitzicht geeft op Rotterdam en waarbij u uitkomt in 1 van de mooiste wijken van Rotterdam de Veerhaven.

Ook is het appartement op 2 min loopafstand gelegen van het Hoogkwartier. Een bruisende en trendy opkomende wijk vol met leuke barretjes en eetgelegenheden.

neighborhood_overview:
This house is located in the popular Liskwartier, which is characterized by leafy avenues, canals and characteristic old buildings. It is a quiet place to live while the urban amenities are easy to reach. This quiet residential area borders the trendy Oude Noorden, with design shops and restaurants on the Zwaanshals and under the arches of the former Hofplein line. The Vroesenpark, the Kralingse Bos and the Plas are also located nearby.

Located within walking distance of shops, restaurants, public transport and within cycling distance of the center and Central Station. Quick access to highway A20 and A13.
Sufficient parking space in the immediate vicinity and in front of the door.
host_about:
I have lived 5 years in Cape Town, South Africa and have now settled in Europe again. Previously I have rented my apartments in Cape Town and Vienna and now my partner and I also want to welcome guest into our beautiful home in Rotterdam.

I love a good documentary, a great innovative idea or concept and exploring the vintage shops of the city.

name: Condo in Rotterdam · ★4.89 · 1 bedroom · 4 beds · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview:
It is located is in a lively and green neighbourhood with a bakery and a coffee/lunchroom/diner (Regina) on 1 minute walking distance. There is also a compact supermarket (Aldi) nearby. The apartment is close both to city and nature. With tram and bus you are in the city in less than 10 minutes! There is also a beautiful forest (Kralingse bos) on walking distance from the apartment.
From the bedroom and living room at the front you have an unobstructed, green view. From the roof terrace you have a view of the Rotterdam Skyline!
At the end of the street public, open air sports facilities for football, basketball, tennis, jeu de boulle and fitness are available for you.

name: Condo in Rotterdam · ★5.0 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview:
Delfshaven is a melting pot of cultures with a rich history. A picturesque medieval harbour is surrounded by lively shopping streets, trend-setting architecture and creative breeding grounds. Experience the dynamics of the water, the ships and the bridges, discover charming neighbourhood parks, cosy terraces and meet 70,000 residents of 170 nationalities.

And talking about parks. Across my apartment is a small park. Perfect place to have a picnic or a BBQ during spring- and summerdays. Every Thursday and Saturday there is a local market where you can buy fresh vegetables, fruits, fish, nuts etc.

I also live next to a school. Maybe good to realize that around 8.30 am the kids will be brought to school and that they sounds very enthusiastic so see other kids again.
host_about:
Hi there!

Welcome at my page!:)
My name is Mirjam, I'm a Dutchie, in daily life I'm a social worker. In my spare time I love to visit new places, nature, singing, a sucker for good coffee,  going out for walks,  try to play guitar ( with the emphasis on 'try'), do my best to give some love to my plants, like to cook and ofcourse... traveling!

Since I was young I already liked traveling.  I remember my family and I were traveling by campervan. Such a joy we had. I continued traveling when I got older. I've been to countries within Europe, but also outside Europe, like: the US, Indonesia, South Africa, Brazil, Curacaõ, Laoh and Thailand.  I've stayed more than a year in Thailand where I've worked on voluntary base as a counselor. 

When I travel I would like to have that feeling of 'home'. That's why I  love to host and to give my guests that feeling of 'home' as well. 

That feeling of traveling and meeting new people, makes me come alive. 
So why not meeting new people, travelers, in my city Rotterdam?

I hope to get to know you a bit as well:)

name: Condo in Rotterdam · ★4.89 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview: Aan het water in historisch Delfshaven. Met mogelijkheid om voor de deur in het haventje te zwemmen. Er is geen doorgaand verkeer. In de buurt zijn veel gezellige restaurantjes en cafés.

name: Condo in Rotterdam · ★4.78 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview:
Located just 10 minutes from the center of Rotterdam in the old, green and quiet part of Rotterdam. If you travel by car (paid parking) you can reach the highway in 5 minutes. The neighborhood has a number of pleasant restaurants, shops and parks to explore. Nearby you'll find Zus en Kees for coffee, Tines for beers and the ''Noordsingel'' for a walk.

You can be quick in the middle of the city. Here you can visit the Markthal, ''Kubuswoningen'', Witte de Withstraat and many museums or architectural highlights. If you cycle in the opposite direction you will arrive at the ''Bergse Plassen'' where you can take a lovely walk in nature.
host_about: Hoi ik ben Nick en ik bied mijn fijne huis aan waar ik inmiddels 3 jaar met plezier woon.

name: Condo in Rotterdam · ★4.63 · 2 bedrooms · 3 beds · 1.5 baths
Condo in Rotterdam · ★5.0 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
Home in Rotterdam · ★5.0 · 3 bedrooms · 3 beds · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview:
LOCATION
You have a continuous holiday feeling in this comfortable house located on the Rotterdamse Schie. Overschie gives you the feeling of a village in terms of space and greenery, while you are still part of the metropolis of Rotterdam.
Discover the rich history of Overschie, visit Museum Oud Overschie and take a walk through the Overschiese village street and along the Schie on the Delfshavenseweg where our family home is located.

STORES
In Overschie you will not lack amenities, there are several shopping streets with local shops and various supermarkets, among others. Lidl, Plus and the Dirk. Rather go to the bustling heart of Rotterdam, take a bike and in fifteen minutes you can enjoy shopping here, have a drink on a terrace or immerse yourself in the Rotterdam nightlife.

MUSEUM
Museum Overschie is that hidden gem in the old village, the rich cultural-historical area of ​​Rotterdam. In this surprising and versatile museum you can experie
host_about:
Wij, Joey en Linda, wonen met veel plezier in ons prachtige huis aan de Schie. Het beste van beiden werelden zeggen we vaak tegen elkaar; op fietsafstand van onze geliefde stad Rotterdam en aan de andere kant de rust en ruimte van het dorp, wonen aan het water aan de rand van de natuur.

Zomers verblijven wij op onze Volkstuin op steenworp afstand van onze woning. Hier genieten we door te tuinieren, te klussen en te relaxen midden in het groen.

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.85 · 1 bedroom · 1.5 shared baths
neighborhood_overview:
The neighborhood offers tranquil environment and has a moderate safety rating. However, it is advisable to remain vigilant against pickpocketing, especially in crowded outdoor areas and public transportation like the metro.

Historic Delfshaven . . . . . . . . . 1 minute🚶🏻‍♂️
Downtown of Delfshaven . . . 2 minute🚶🏻‍♂️
Downtown of Rotterdam . . . .7 min 🚇 or 30 min🚶🏻‍♂️

Nice pictures can be captured in the historic part of Delfshaven, which still has old remaining buildings that go back as far as the 13th century.

The main street (Schiedamseweg) has a lot to offer, supermarkets, night shops, low-range($) restaurants, "brown" cafes.

Rotterdam also offers Free Walking tours which I'd recommend if you’re interested to know more about Rotterdam, its history and its hidden gems. Offered in multiple languages and usually very quick availability.
host_about:
I am 26, gay, love traveling, and getting to know other people’s cultures with an open mind and heart. I have been hosting for over a year at Airbnb now.

"Love and compassion are necessities, not luxuries. Without them, humanity cannot survive." - Dalai Lama

My hobbies/passions are: playing guitar, bikes, languages, clubbing, cooking, playing Xbox and mark as many countries and places possible on Skratch :D

neighborhood_overview: We live in the heart of the cute neighbourhood Oud-Charlois, which is a stones-throw away from the large Zuiderpark, Zuidplein with a huge indoor swimming pool, a theatre and a mall and Ahoy for concerts. The neighbourhood is friendly and residential. We love and appreciate (after living in noisy streets) how quiet it is here!

neighborhood_overview: Hilligersberg is een van de mooiste wijken van Rotterdam. Vrij rustig gelegen, mooie huizen en veel groen maar ook vlakbij het centrum. Het appartement is vlakbij de kleiweg: hier vind je een Albert Heijn, restaurants, leuke winkeltjes. Aan het einde van de straat is de rivier de rotte, deze kan je richting het Noorden volgen voor een mooie wandeling rondom de Bergse Plassen. In de zomer kan je hier ook een bootje huren. Genoeg te doen!

name: Condo in Rotterdam · ★4.88 · 3 bedrooms · 4 beds · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview: Blijdorp is een van de mooiste buurten van Rottedam. Het centrum van Rotterdam is dichtbij, én ook veel andere voorzieningen zijn direct om de hoek: het prachtige zwembad "Van Manenbad", dierentuin "Diergaarde Blijdorp", tennispark Blijdorp, het Vroesenpark met het "Vroesenpaviljoen" waar lekker geluncht en ontbeten kan worden, ijssalon "Di Gelato" met de meest verrukelijke ijssmaken en nog een heleboel leuke cafés en restaurants met een divers aanbod. In de wijk kom je oud en jong tegen, van gezinnen tot studenten en starters tot gepensioneerden. In de lente en zomer komen de buurtbewoners aan de Statensingel of in het Vroesenpark bij elkaar om te BBQen of gezellig langs het water te zitten en te borrelen. Supermarkten, snackbars, ouderwetse en moderne kroegen, tweedehands winkels enzovoort...in Blijdorp heb je ze allemaal. Blijdorp is gewoon heel leuk en zeker een bezoek waard!

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.80 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 shared bath
Condo in Rotterdam · ★5.0 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview: Scheepvaartkwartier zit tegen het centrum van Rotterdam aan. We wonen aan de voet van de Erasmusbrug en binnen 5 minuten ben je op de gezellige Witte de withstraat waar je allerlei restaurants en cafe's kunt vinden. Maar bij het appartement vindt je om de hoek ook allerlei eetgelegenheden zoals restaurant Loos of Frans restaurant Petit Louise. Als je een mooie boottocht wil maken dan is de Maas ook echt 1 minuut lopen van het appartement.
